anya-e0103n7:2_1: “Anu anu sati anussatī”ti imamatthaṁ dassetuṁ “punappunaṁ uppajjanato”ti vatvā na
anya-e0103n7:2_2: ettha anu-saddayogena sati-saddo atthantaravācakoti dassetuṁ “satiyeva anussatī”ti
anya-e0103n7:2_3: vuttaṁ. Tena nāyamanu-saddo “upalabbhatī”tiādīsu upa-saddo viya anatthako, nāpi “sañjānanaṁ
anya-e0103n7:2_5: vā pavattattā”ti iminā ca anussatiyā anussaritabbānurūpatā vuttā hotīti pavattakasseva
anya-e0103n7:2_6: anurūpataṁ dassetuṁ “kulaputtassa anurūpā”ti vuttaṁ, saddhāpabbajitassa vā kulaputtassa.
anya-e0103n7:2_7: Anurūpatā nāma pavattitabbaṭṭhānassa anurūpatāya eva hotīti pavattakasseva anurūpatā
anya-e0103n7:2_8: vuttā, na ubhayassa. Anurūpāti ca yuttāti attho. Buddhanti ye guṇe upādāya bhagavati
anya-e0103n7:2_9: “buddho”ti paññatti, te guṇe ekajjhaṁ gahetvā vuttaṁ. Tenāha “buddhaguṇārammaṇāya
anya-e0103n7:2_10: satiyā etamadhivacana”nti. Ārabbhāti ālambitvā. Dhammanti pariyattidhammena saddhiṁ
anya-e0103n7:2_11: navavidhampi lokuttaradhammaṁ. Nanu ca nibbānaṁ visuṁ kammaṭṭhānabhāvena vakkhati?
anya-e0103n7:2_12: Kiñcāpi vakkhati, dhammabhāvasāmaññena pana maggaphalehi saddhiṁ idha pāḷiyā saṅgahitattā
anya-e0103n7:2_13: tassāpi dhammānussatikammaṭṭhāne gahaṇaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ, asaṅkhatāmatādibhāvena pana
anya-e0103n7:2_14: maggaphalehi visiṭṭhatāya tassa visuṁ kammaṭṭhānabhāvena gahaṇaṁ kataṁ. Sīlānussatiādīnaṁ
anya-e0103n7:2_15: pana tissannaṁ anussatīnaṁ visuṁ kammaṭṭhānabhāvena gahaṇaṁ yogāvacarassa attano
anya-e0103n7:2_16: eva sīlassa cāgassa saddhādīnañca anussatiṭṭhānabhāvena gahetabbattā. Rūpakāyaṁ gatāti
anya-e0103n7:2_17: attano karajakāyaṁ ārabbha ārammaṇakaraṇavasena pavattā. Kāyeti kāye visayabhūte.
anya-e0103n7:2_19: sattasu anussatīsu natthi nimittuppatti, idha atthīti dassanatthaṁ nimitta-ggahaṇaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:2_20: Tathā assāsapassāsanimittārammaṇāyāti etthāpi. Upasamanti sabbasaṅkhārūpasamaṁ, nibbānanti attho.
anya-e0103n7:3_0: 124. Avecca buddhaguṇe yāthāvato ñatvā uppanno pasādo aveccappasādo, ariyamaggena
anya-e0103n7:3_1: āgatappasādo, taṁsadisopi vā yo diṭṭhigatavātehi acalo asampakampiyo, tena samannāgatena.
anya-e0103n7:3_2: Tādisassa buddhānussatibhāvanā ijjhati, na itarassa. Patirūpasenāsaneti yathāvuttaaṭṭhārasadosavajjite
anya-e0103n7:3_3: pañcaṅgasamannāgate senāsane. Rahogatenāti rahasi gatena. Tena kāyavivekaṁ dasseti.
anya-e0103n7:3_4: Paṭisallīnenāti nānārammaṇato paṭisallīnena, bahiddhā puthuttārammaṇato paṭikkamāpetvā
anya-e0103n7:3_5: kammaṭṭhāne sallīnena, susiliṭṭhacittenāti attho. Evanti imāya pāḷiyā āgatanayena.
anya-e0103n7:4_0: So bhagavāti ettha soti yo so samatiṁsa pāramiyo pūretvā sabbakilese bhañjitvā anuttaraṁ
anya-e0103n7:4_1: sammāsambodhiṁ abhisambuddho devānaṁ atidevo brahmānaṁ atibrahmā lokanātho bhāgyavantatādīhi
anya-e0103n7:4_2: kāraṇehi sadevake loke “bhagavā”ti patthaṭakittisaddo, so. Bhagavāti idaṁ satthu
anya-e0103n7:4_3: nāmakittanaṁ. Tathā hi vuttaṁ “bhagavāti netaṁ nāmaṁ mātarā kata”ntiādi. Parato pana
anya-e0103n7:4_4: bhagavāti guṇakittanaṁ. Arahantiādīsu navasu ṭhānesu paccekaṁ itipi-saddaṁ yojetvā
anya-e0103n7:4_5: buddhaguṇā anussaritabbāti dassento “itipi arahaṁ…pe… itipi bhagavāti anussaratī”ti
anya-e0103n7:4_6: āha. “Itipetaṁ bhūtaṁ itipetaṁ taccha”ntiādīsu viya iti-saddo āsannapaccakkhakaraṇattho,
anya-e0103n7:4_7: pi-saddo sampiṇḍanattho. Tena nesaṁ bahubhāvo dīpito, tāni ca guṇasallakkhaṇakāraṇāni
anya-e0103n7:4_8: bhāventena cittassa sammukhībhūtāni kātabbānīti dassento “iminā ca iminā ca kāraṇenāti vuttaṁ hotī”ti āha.
anya-e0103n7:5_0: 125. Dūratā nāma āsannatā viya upādāyupādāya vuccatīti paramukkaṁsagataṁ dūrabhāvaṁ
anya-e0103n7:5_1: dassento “suvidūravidūre”ti āha, suṭṭhu vidūrabhāveneva vidūreti attho. Sā panassa
anya-e0103n7:5_2: kilesato dūratā tesaṁ sabbaso pahīnattāti dassento āha “maggena kilesānaṁ viddhaṁsitattā”ti.
anya-e0103n7:5_3: Nanu aññesampi khīṇāsavānaṁ te pahīnā evāti anuyogaṁ manasi katvā vuttaṁ “savāsanāna”nti.
anya-e0103n7:5_4: Na hi bhagavantaṁ ṭhapetvā aññe saha vāsanāya kilese pahātuṁ sakkonti, etena aññehi
anya-e0103n7:5_5: asādhāraṇaṁ bhagavato arahattanti dassitaṁ hoti. Kā panāyaṁ vāsanā nāma? Pahīnakilesassāpi
anya-e0103n7:5_7: pilindavacchassa vasalasamudācāranimittaṁ viya. Kathaṁ pana “ārakā”ti vutte “kilesehī”ti
anya-e0103n7:5_8: ayamattho labbhatīti? Sāmaññajotanāya visese avaṭṭhānato, visesatthinā ca visesassa
anya-e0103n7:5_9: anupayojetabbato, “ārakāssa honti pāpakā akusalā dhammā”tiādīni suttapadānettha udāharitabbāni.
anya-e0103n7:5_10: Ārakāti cettha ā-kārassa rassattaṁ, ka-kārassa ca ha-kāraṁ, sānusāraṁ katvā niruttinayena
anya-e0103n7:5_11: “araha”nti padasiddhi veditabbā. Vuttamevatthaṁ sukhaggahaṇatthaṁ “so tato ārakā
anya-e0103n7:5_12: nāmā”ti gāthābandhamāha. Tattha samañjanasīlo samaṅgī, na samaṅgitā asamaṅgitā asamannāgamo asahavuttitā.
anya-e0103n7:6: 126. Anatthacaraṇena kilesā eva arayoti kilesārayo. “Arīnaṁ hatattā arihā”ti vattabbe niruttinayena “araha”nti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:7_0: 127. Yañcetaṁ saṁsāracakkanti sambandho. Rathacakkassa nābhi viya mūlāvayavabhūtaṁ
anya-e0103n7:7_1: anto, bahi ca samavaṭṭhitaṁ avijjābhavataṇhāmayaṁ dvayanti vuttaṁ “avijjābhavataṇhāmayanābhī”ti.
anya-e0103n7:7_2: Nābhiyā, nemiyā ca sambandhā arasadisā paccayaphalabhūtehi avijjātaṇhājarāmaraṇehi
anya-e0103n7:7_3: sambandhā puññādisaṅkhārāti vuttaṁ “puññādiabhisaṅkhārāra”nti. Tattha tattha bhave
anya-e0103n7:7_4: pariyantabhāvena pākaṭaṁ jarāmaraṇanti taṁ nemiṭṭhāniyaṁ katvā āha “jarāmaraṇanemī”ti.
anya-e0103n7:7_5: Yathā ca rathacakkapavattiyā padhānakāraṇaṁ akkho, evaṁ saṁsāracakkapavattiyā āsavasamudayoti
anya-e0103n7:7_6: āha “āsavasamudayamayena akkhena vijjhitvā”ti. Āsavā eva avijjādīnaṁ kāraṇattā āsavasamudayo.
anya-e0103n7:7_8: tibhavo eva ratho, tasmiṁ tibhavarathe. Attano paccayehi samaṁ, sabbaso vā ādito
anya-e0103n7:7_9: paṭṭhāya yojitanti samāyojitaṁ. Ādirahitaṁ kālaṁ pavattatīti katvā anādikālappavattaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:10_0: Evaṁ vuttasaṁsārova saṁsāracakkaṁ. Anenāti bhagavatā. Bodhimaṇḍeti bodhisaṅkhātassa
anya-e0103n7:10_1: ñāṇassa maṇḍabhāvappatte ṭhāne, kāle vā. Vīriyapādehīti saṁkilesavodānapakkhiyesu
anya-e0103n7:10_2: sannirumbhanasannikkhipanakiccatāya dvidhā pavattehi attano vīriyasaṅkhātehi pādehi.
anya-e0103n7:10_3: Sīlapathaviyanti patiṭṭhaṭṭhena sīlameva pathavī, tassaṁ. Patiṭṭhāyāti sampādanavasena
anya-e0103n7:10_4: patiṭṭhahitvā. Saddhāhatthenāti anavajjadhammādānasādhanato saddhāva hattho, tena.
anya-e0103n7:10_5: Kammakkhayakaranti kāyakammādibhedassa sabbassapi kammassa khayakaraṇato kammakkhayakaraṁ.
anya-e0103n7:11_0: 128. Evaṁ “arānaṁ hatattā”ti ettha vuttaaraghāte saṁsāraṁ cakkaṁ viya cakkanti gahetvā
anya-e0103n7:11_1: atthayojanaṁ katvā idāni paṭiccasamuppādadesanākkamenapi taṁ dassetuṁ “atha vā”tiādi
anya-e0103n7:11_2: vuttaṁ. Tattha anamataggaṁ saṁsāravaṭṭanti anu anu amataggaṁ aviññātakoṭikaṁ saṁsāramaṇḍalaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:11_3: Sesā dasa dhammā saṅkhārādayo jātipariyosānā arā. Kathaṁ? Nābhiyā avijjāya mūlato,
anya-e0103n7:11_4: nemiyā jarāmaraṇena antato sambandhattāti dassento āha “avijjāmūlakattā jarāmaraṇapariyantattā
anya-e0103n7:11_5: cā”ti. Dukkhādīsūti dukkhasamudayanirodhamaggesu. Tattha dukkhe aññāṇaṁ tadantogadhattā,
anya-e0103n7:11_6: tappaṭicchādanato ca, sesesu paṭicchādanatova. Dukkhanti cettha dukkhaṁ ariyasaccaṁ
anya-e0103n7:11_7: adhippetanti taṁ kāmabhavādivasena tidhā bhinditvā tathā tappaṭicchādikaṁ avijjaṁ,
anya-e0103n7:11_8: avijjādipaccaye tīsu bhavesu saṅkhārādike ca paṭipāṭiyā dassento “kāmabhave ca avijjā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0103n7:11_9: Tattha kāmabhave avijjāti kāmabhave ādīnavappaṭicchādikā avijjā. Rūpabhave arūpabhave
anya-e0103n7:11_10: avijjāti etthāpi eseva nayo. Kāmabhave saṅkhārānanti kāmabhūmipariyāpannānaṁ saṅkhārānaṁ,
anya-e0103n7:11_11: kāmabhave vā nipphādetabbā ye saṅkhārā, tesaṁ kāmabhavūpapattinibbattakasaṅkhārānanti
anya-e0103n7:11_12: attho. Paccayo hotīti puññābhisaṅkhārānaṁ tāva ārammaṇapaccayena ceva upanissayapaccayena
anya-e0103n7:11_13: cāti dvidhā paccayo hoti. Apuññābhisaṅkhāresu sahajātassa sahajātādivasena, asahajātassa
anya-e0103n7:11_14: anantarasamanantarādivasena, nānantarassa pana ārammaṇavasena ceva upanissayavasena
anya-e0103n7:11_15: ca paccayo hoti. Arūpabhave saṅkhārānanti āneñjābhisaṅkhārānaṁ. Paccayo hoti upanissayavaseneva.
anya-e0103n7:11_16: Imasmiṁ panatthe ettha vitthāriyamāne atippapañco hoti, sayameva ca parato āgamissatīti
anya-e0103n7:12_0: Tiṇṇaṁ āyatanānanti cakkhusotamanāyatanānaṁ. Ekassāyatanassāti manāyatanassa. Iminā
anya-e0103n7:12_1: nayena phassādīnampi vibhāgo veditabbo. Tattha tattha sā sā taṇhāti rūpataṇhādibhedā
anya-e0103n7:13_0: Taṇhādimūlikā kathā atisaṁkhittāti taṁ, upādānabhave ca vibhajitvā vitthāretvā dassetuṁ
anya-e0103n7:13_2: Tathā “saggasampattiṁ anubhavissāmī”tiādīhi. Sā pana taṇhā yasmā bhusamādānavasena
anya-e0103n7:13_3: pavattamānā kāmupādānaṁ nāma hoti, tasmā vuttaṁ “kāmupādānapaccayā”ti. Tathevāti
anya-e0103n7:14_0: Brahmalokasampattinti rūpībrahmaloke sampattiṁ. “Sabbepi tebhūmakā dhammā kāmanīyaṭṭhena
anya-e0103n7:14_1: kāmā”ti vacanato bhavarāgopi kāmupādānamevāti katvā “kāmupādānapaccayā eva mettaṁ
anya-e0103n7:14_2: bhāvetī”tiādi vuttaṁ. Sesupādānamūlikāsupīti etthāyaṁ yojanā – idhekacco “natthi
anya-e0103n7:14_3: paro loko”ti natthikadiṭṭhiṁ gaṇhāti, so diṭṭhupādānapaccayā kāyena duccaritaṁ caratītiādi
anya-e0103n7:14_4: vuttanayena yojetabbaṁ. Aparo “asukasmiṁ sampattibhave attā ucchijjatī”ti ucchedadiṭṭhiṁ
anya-e0103n7:14_5: gaṇhāti, so tatrūpapattiyā kāyena sucaritaṁ caratītiādi vuttanayeneva yojetabbaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:14_6: Aparo “rūpī manomayo hutvā attā ucchijjatī”ti rūpūpapattiyā maggaṁ bhāveti. Bhāvanāpāripūriyāti
anya-e0103n7:14_7: sabbaṁ vuttanayeneva veditabbaṁ. Aparo “arūpabhave uppajjitvā attā ucchijjatī”ti
anya-e0103n7:14_8: arūpūpapattiyā maggaṁ bhāveti. Bhāvanāpāripūriyāti sabbaṁ vuttanayeneva veditabbaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:14_9: Etāhiyeva attavādupādānamūlikāpi yojanā saṁvaṇṇitāti daṭṭhabbaṁ. Evaṁ diṭṭhadhammanibbānavādavasenāpi
anya-e0103n7:14_10: yojanā veditabbā. Aparo “sīlena suddhī”ti “asuddhimaggaṁ suddhimaggo”ti parāmasanto
anya-e0103n7:14_11: sīlabbatupādānapaccayā kāyena duccaritaṁ caratītiādinā sabbaṁ vuttanayeneva yojetabbaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:15_0: Idāni yvāyaṁ saṁsāracakkaṁ dassentena “kāmabhave avijjā kāmabhave saṅkhārānaṁ paccayo
anya-e0103n7:15_1: hotī”tiādinā avijjādīnaṁ paccayabhāvo, saṅkhārādīnaṁ paccayuppannabhāvo ca dassito,
anya-e0103n7:15_2: tameva paṭisambhidāmaggapāḷiṁ ānetvā nigamanavasena dassento “evaṁ aya”ntiādimāha.
anya-e0103n7:15_3: Tattha yathā saṅkhārā hetunibbattā, evaṁ avijjāpi kāmāsavādinā sahetukā evāti āha
anya-e0103n7:15_5: paricchijja gahaṇe, nipphādetabbe bhummaṁ. Paññāti kaṅkhāvitaraṇavisuddhisaṅkhātā
anya-e0103n7:15_6: pakārato jānanā. Dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇanti paṭiccasamuppādāvabodho. Idañca dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇaṁ
anya-e0103n7:15_7: yasmā addhāttaye kaṅkhāmalavitaraṇavasena pavattati, tasmā “atītampi addhāna”ntiādi
anya-e0103n7:15_8: vuttaṁ. Eteneva nayenāti etena “avijjā hetū”tiādinā avijjāyaṁ vuttena nayena. “Saṅkhārā
anya-e0103n7:16_0: Saṁkhippanti ettha avijjādayo, viññāṇādayo cāti saṅkhepo, hetu, vipāko ca. Hetu vipākoti
anya-e0103n7:16_1: vā saṁkhippatīti saṅkhepo, avijjādayo viññāṇādayo ca. Saṅkhepabhāvasāmaññena pana
anya-e0103n7:16_2: ekavacanaṁ katanti daṭṭhabbaṁ. Te pana saṅkhepā atīte hetu, etarahi vipāko, etarahi
anya-e0103n7:16_3: hetu, āyatiṁ vipākoti evaṁ kālavibhāgena cattāro jātā. Tenāha “purimasaṅkhepo cettha
anya-e0103n7:16_4: atīto addhā”tiādi. Saṅkhepa-saddo vā bhāgādhivacananti atīto hetubhāgo paṭhamo saṅkhepo.
anya-e0103n7:16_5: Esa nayo sesesupi. Taṇhupādānabhavā gahitāva honti kilesakammabhāvasāmaññato, tehi
anya-e0103n7:16_6: vinā avijjāsaṅkhārānaṁ sakiccākaraṇato ca. Kammaṁ taṇhā ca tassa sahakārīkāraṇaṁ
anya-e0103n7:17_2: Āyatiṁ vipākavaṭṭaṁ paccuppannahetuto bhāvīnaṁ anāgatānaṁ gahitattā. Teti avijjādayo.
anya-e0103n7:17_3: Ākāratoti sarūpato avuttāpi tasmiṁ tasmiṁ saṅgahe ākirīyanti avijjāsaṅkhārādiggahaṇehi
anya-e0103n7:17_4: pakāsīyantīti ākārā, atītahetuādīnaṁ vā pakārā ākārā, tato ākārato. Vīsatividhā honti
anya-e0103n7:18_0: Saṅkhāraviññāṇānaṁ antarā eko sandhīti hetuto phalassa avicchedappavattibhāvato hetuphalasambandhabhūto
anya-e0103n7:18_1: eko sandhi. Tathā bhavajātīnamantarā. Vedanātaṇhānamantarā pana phalato hetuno avicchedappavattibhāvato
anya-e0103n7:18_2: phalahetusambandhabhūto eko sandhi. Phalabhūtopi hi dhammo aññassa hetusabhāvassa
anya-e0103n7:19_0: Itīti vuttappakāraparāmasanaṁ. Tenāha “catusaṅkhepa”ntiādi. Sabbākāratoti idha vuttehi,
anya-e0103n7:19_1: avuttehi ca paṭiccasamuppādavibhaṅge, anantanayasamantapaṭṭhānādīsu ca āgatehi sabbehi
anya-e0103n7:19_2: ākārehi. Jānātīti avabujjhati. Passatīti dassanabhūtena ñāṇacakkhunā paccakkhato
anya-e0103n7:19_3: passati. Aññāti paṭivijjhatīti tesaṁyeva vevacanaṁ. Tanti taṁ jānanaṁ. Ñātaṭṭhenāti
anya-e0103n7:19_4: yathāsabhāvato jānanaṭṭhena. Pajānanaṭṭhenāti aniccādīhi pakārehi paṭivijjhanaṭṭhena.
anya-e0103n7:20_0: Idāni yadatthamidaṁ bhavacakkaṁ idhānītaṁ, taṁ dassetuṁ “iminā”tiādi vuttaṁ. Tattha
anya-e0103n7:20_1: te dhammeti te avijjādike dhamme. Yathābhūtaṁ ñatvāti mahāvajirañāṇena yāthāvato
anya-e0103n7:20_2: jānitvā. Nibbindanto balavavipassanāya virajjanto vimuccanto ariyamaggehi are hanīti
anya-e0103n7:20_3: yojanā. Tattha yadā bhagavā virajjati vimuccati, tadā are hanati nāma. Tato paraṁ
anya-e0103n7:20_4: pana abhisambuddhakkhaṇaṁ gahetvā vuttaṁ “hani vihani viddhaṁsesī”ti.
anya-e0103n7:21_0: 129. Cakkavattino acetane cakkaratane uppanne tattheva loko pūjaṁ karoti, aññattha
anya-e0103n7:21_1: pūjāvisesā pacchijjanti, kimaṅgaṁ pana sammāsambuddhe uppanneti dassento “uppanne
anya-e0103n7:21_2: tathāgate”tiādimāha. Ko pana vādo aññesaṁ pūjāvisesānanti yathāvuttato aññesaṁ amahesakkhehi
anya-e0103n7:21_3: devamanussehi kariyamānānaṁ nātiuḷārānaṁ pūjāvisesānaṁ arahabhāve kā nāma kathā.
anya-e0103n7:22_0: 130.Asilokabhayenāti akittibhayena. Raho pāpaṁ karonti “mā naṁ koci jaññā”ti esa
anya-e0103n7:22_1: bhagavā na kadāci karoti pāpahetūnaṁ bodhimaṇḍe eva suppahīnattā. Aparo nayo – ārakāti
anya-e0103n7:22_2: arahaṁ, suvidūrabhāvatoicceva attho. Kuto pana suvidūrabhāvatoti? Ye abhāvitakāyā
anya-e0103n7:22_3: abhāvitasīlā abhāvitacittā abhāvitapaññā, tato eva appahīnarāgadosamohā ariyadhammassa
anya-e0103n7:22_4: akovidā ariyadhamme avinītā ariyadhammassa adassāvino appaṭipannā micchāpaṭipannā
anya-e0103n7:23_0: “Saṅghāṭikaṇṇecepi me, bhikkhave, bhikkhu gahetvā piṭṭhito piṭṭhito anubandho assa
anya-e0103n7:23_1: pāde pādaṁ nikkhipanto, so ca hoti abhijjhālu kāmesu tibbasārāgo byāpannacitto paduṭṭhamanasaṅkappo
anya-e0103n7:23_2: muṭṭhassati asampajāno asamāhito vibbhantacitto pākatindriyo. Atha kho so ārakāva
anya-e0103n7:23_3: mayhaṁ, ahañca tassa. Taṁ kissa hetu? Dhammaṁ hi so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na passati,
anya-e0103n7:24: Yathāvuttapuggalā hi sacepi sāyaṁ pātaṁ satthu santikāvacarāva siyuṁ, na te tāvatā “satthu santikā”ti vattabbā, tathā satthāpi nesaṁ. Iti asappurisānaṁ ārakā dūreti arahaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:26: Ārakā tehi bhagavā, dūre tenārahaṁ mato”ti.
anya-e0103n7:27_0: Tathā ārakāti arahaṁ, āsannabhāvatoti attho. Kuto pana āsannabhāvatoti? Ye bhāvitakāyā
anya-e0103n7:27_1: bhāvitasīlā bhāvitacittā bhāvitapaññā, tato eva pahīnarāgadosamohā ariyadhammassa
anya-e0103n7:27_2: kovidā ariyadhamme suvinītā ariyadhammassa dassāvino sammāpaṭipannā, tato āsannabhāvato.
anya-e0103n7:28_0: “Yojanasate cepi me, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vihareyya, so ca hoti anabhijjhālu kāmesu
anya-e0103n7:28_1: na tibbasārāgo abyāpannacitto appaduṭṭhamanasaṅkappo upaṭṭhitassati sampajāno samāhito
anya-e0103n7:28_2: ekaggacitto saṁvutindriyo. Atha kho so santikeva mayhaṁ, ahañca tassa. Taṁ kissa
anya-e0103n7:28_3: hetu? Dhammaṁ hi so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu passati, dhammaṁ passanto maṁ passatī”ti.
anya-e0103n7:29: Tathārūpā hi puggalā satthu yojanasahassantarikāpi honti, na tāvatā te “satthu dūracārino”ti vattabbā, tathā satthāpi nesaṁ. Iti sappurisānaṁ ārakā āsanneti arahaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:31: Ārakā tehi āsanne, tenāpi arahaṁ jino.
anya-e0103n7:32_0: Ye ime rāgādayo pāpadhammā yasmiṁ santāne uppajjanti, tassa diṭṭhadhammikampi samparāyikampi
anya-e0103n7:32_1: anatthaṁ āvahanti. Nibbānagāminiyā paṭipadāya ekaṁseneva ujuvipaccanīkabhūtā ca,
anya-e0103n7:32_2: te attahitaṁ, parahitañca paripūretuṁ sammā paṭipajjantehi sādhūhi dūrato rahitabbā
anya-e0103n7:32_3: pariccajitabbā pahātabbāti rahā nāma, te ca yasmā bhagavato bodhimūleyeva ariyamaggena
anya-e0103n7:33: “Tathāgatassa kho, brāhmaṇa, rāgo pahīno doso moho, sabbepi pāpakā akusalā dhammā pahīnā ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṁkatā āyatiṁ anuppādadhammā”ti.
anya-e0103n7:34: Tasmā sabbaso na santi etassa rahāti arahoti vattabbe okārassa sānusāraṁ a-kārādesaṁ katvā “araha”nti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:36: Tesaṁ suṭṭhu pahīnattā, bhagavā arahaṁ mato.
anya-e0103n7:37_0: Ye te sabbaso pariññātakkhandhā pahīnakilesā bhāvitamaggā sacchikatanirodhā arahanto
anya-e0103n7:37_1: khīṇāsavā, ye ca sekkhā appattamānasā anuttaraṁ yogakkhemaṁ patthayamānā viharanti,
anya-e0103n7:37_2: ye ca parisuddhapayogā kalyāṇajjhāsayā saddhāsīlasutādiguṇasampannā puggalā, tehi
anya-e0103n7:37_3: na rahitabbo na pariccajitabbo, te ca bhagavatāti arahaṁ. Tathā hi ariyapuggalā satthārā
anya-e0103n7:37_4: diṭṭhadhammassa paccakkhakaraṇato satthu dhammasarīrena avirahitā eva honti. Yathāha āyasmā piṅgiyo –
anya-e0103n7:42: “Saddhā ca pīti ca mano sati ca,
anya-e0103n7:46: Teneva ca te aññaṁ satthāraṁ na uddisanti. Yathāha –
anya-e0103n7:47: “Aṭṭhānametaṁ, bhikkhave, anavakāso, yaṁ diṭṭhisampanno puggalo aññaṁ satthāraṁ uddiseyyāti netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjatī”ti.
anya-e0103n7:48_0: Kalyāṇaputhujjanāpi yebhuyyena satthari niccalasaddhā eva honti. Iti suppaṭipannehi
anya-e0103n7:48_1: purisavisesehi avirahitabbato, tesañca avirahanato na santi etassa rahā pariccajanakā,
anya-e0103n7:48_2: natthi vā etassa raho sādhūhi pariccajitabbatāti arahaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:50: Na tehi rahito hoti, nātho tenārahaṁ mato”ti.
anya-e0103n7:51_0: Rahoti ca gamanaṁ vuccati, bhagavato ca nānāgatīsu paribbhamanasaṅkhātaṁ saṁsāre
anya-e0103n7:51_1: gamanaṁ natthi kammakkhayakarena ariyamaggena bodhimūleyeva sabbaso sasambhārassa
anya-e0103n7:54: Te mayhaṁ āsavā khīṇā, viddhastā vinaḷīkatā”ti. ;
anya-e0103n7:55: Evaṁ natthi etassa rahogamanaṁ gatīsu paccājātītipi arahaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:56: Raho vā gamanaṁ yassa, saṁsāre natthi sabbaso;
anya-e0103n7:58_0: Pāsaṁsattā vā bhagavā arahaṁ. Akkharacintakā hi pasaṁsāyaṁ araha-saddaṁ vaṇṇenti.
anya-e0103n7:58_1: Pāsaṁsabhāvo ca bhagavato anaññasādhāraṇo yathābhuccaguṇādhigato sadevake loke suppatiṭṭhito.
anya-e0103n7:58_2: Tathā hesa anuttarena sīlena anuttarena samādhinā anuttarāya paññāya anuttarāya vimuttiyā
anya-e0103n7:58_3: asamo asamasamo appaṭimo appaṭibhāgo appaṭipuggaloti evaṁ tasmiṁ tasmiṁ guṇe vibhajitvā
anya-e0103n7:58_4: vuccamāne paṇḍitapurisehi devehi brahmehi bhagavatā vā pana pariyosāpetuṁ asakkuṇeyyarūpo.
anya-e0103n7:59: Guṇehi sadiso natthi, yasmā loke sadevake;
anya-e0103n7:64: Bhavesu ca rahābhāvā, pāsaṁsā arahaṁ jino”ti.
anya-e0103n7:65_0: 131.Sammāti aviparītaṁ. Sāmanti sayameva. Sambuddhoti hi ettha saṁ-saddo “saya”nti
anya-e0103n7:65_1: etassa atthassa bodhako daṭṭhabbo. Sabbadhammānanti anavasesānaṁ ñeyyadhammānaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:65_2: Kathaṁ panettha sabbadhammāvabodho labbhatīti? Ekadesassa aggahaṇato. Padesaggahaṇe
anya-e0103n7:65_3: hi asati gahetabbassa nippadesatāva viññāyati yathā “dikkhito na dadātī”ti. Evañca
anya-e0103n7:65_4: katvā atthavisesānapekkhā kattari eva buddhasaddasiddhi veditabbā kammavacanicchāya
anya-e0103n7:65_5: abhāvato. “Sammā sāmaṁ buddhattā sammāsambuddho”ti ettakameva hi idha saddato labbhati,
anya-e0103n7:65_6: “sabbadhammāna”nti pana atthato labbhamānaṁ gahetvā vuttaṁ. Na hi bujjhanakiriyā avisayā yujjati.
anya-e0103n7:66_0: Idāni tassā visayaṁ “sabbadhamme”ti sāmaññato vuttaṁ vibhajitvā dassetuṁ “abhiññeyye
anya-e0103n7:66_1: dhamme”tiādi vuttaṁ. Tattha abhiññeyyeti abhivisiṭṭhena ñāṇena jānitabbe. Ke pana
anya-e0103n7:66_2: teti? Catusaccadhamme. Abhiññeyyato buddhoti abhiññeyyabhāvato bujjhi. Pubbabhāge
anya-e0103n7:66_3: vipassanāpaññāya, adhigamakkhaṇe maggapaññāya, aparabhāge sabbaññutaññāṇādīhi aññāsīti
anya-e0103n7:66_4: attho. Ito paresupi eseva nayo. Pariññeyye dhammeti dukkhaṁ ariyasaccamāha. Pahātabbeti
anya-e0103n7:66_5: samudayapakkhiye. Sacchikātabbeti nibbānaṁ sandhāyāha. Bahuvacananiddeso pana sopādisesādikaṁ
anya-e0103n7:66_6: pariyāyasiddhaṁ bhedaṁ gahetvā kato, uddeso vā ayaṁ catusaccadhammānanti. Tathā hi
anya-e0103n7:66_7: vakkhati “cakkhuṁ dukkhasacca”ntiādi. Uddeso ca avinicchitatthaparicchedassa dhammassa
anya-e0103n7:66_8: vasena karīyati. Uddesena hi uddisiyamānānaṁ dhammānaṁ atthitāmattaṁ vuccati, na
anya-e0103n7:66_9: paricchedoti aparicchedena bahuvacanena vuttaṁ yathā “appaccayā dhammā, asaṅkhatā
anya-e0103n7:66_10: dhammā”ti. Sacchikātabbeti vā phalavimuttīnampi gahaṇaṁ, na nibbānassevāti bahuvacananiddeso
anya-e0103n7:66_11: kato. Evañca bhāvetabbeti ettha jhānānampi gahaṇaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:67_0: Gāthāyaṁ bhāvetabbañcāti ettha ca-saddo avuttasamuccayattho, tena sacchikātabbassa
anya-e0103n7:67_1: gahaṇaṁ veditabbaṁ. Tasmā buddhosmīti yasmā cattāri saccāni mayā buddhāni, saccavinimuttañca
anya-e0103n7:67_2: kiñci ñeyyaṁ natthi, tasmā sabbampi ñeyyaṁ buddhosmi, abbhaññāsinti attho.
anya-e0103n7:68_0: 132. Evaṁ saccavasena sāmaññato vuttamatthaṁ dvārārammaṇehi saddhiṁ dvārappavattadhammehi,
anya-e0103n7:68_1: khandhādīhi ca saccavaseneva vibhajitvā dassetuṁ “api cā”tiādi āraddhaṁ. Tattha mūlakāraṇabhāvenāti
anya-e0103n7:68_2: santesupi avijjādīsu aññesu kāraṇesu tesampi mūlabhūtakāraṇabhāvena. Taṇhā hi kammassa
anya-e0103n7:68_3: vicittabhāvahetuto, sahāyabhāvūpagamanato ca dukkhavicittatāya padhānakāraṇaṁ. Samuṭṭhāpikāti
anya-e0103n7:68_4: uppādikā. Purimataṇhāti purimabhavasiddhā taṇhā. Ubhinnanti cakkhussa, taṁsamudayassa
anya-e0103n7:69_0: Kasiṇānīti kasiṇajjhānāni. Dvattiṁsākārāti dvattiṁsa koṭṭhāsā, tadārammaṇajjhānāni
anya-e0103n7:69_1: ca. Nava bhavāti kāmabhavādayo tayo, saññībhavādayo tayo, ekavokārabhavādayo tayoti
anya-e0103n7:69_2: nava bhavā. Cattāri jhānānīti aggahitārammaṇavisesāni cattāri rūpāvacarajjhānāni,
anya-e0103n7:69_3: vipākajjhānānaṁ vā etaṁ gahaṇaṁ. Ettha ca kusaladhammānaṁ upanissayabhūtā taṇhā samuṭṭhāpikā
anya-e0103n7:69_4: purimataṇhāti veditabbā. Kiriyadhammānaṁ pana yattha te tassa attabhāvassa kāraṇabhūtā.
anya-e0103n7:70_0: Anubuddhoti bujjhitabbadhammassa anurūpato buddho. Tenāti tasmā. Yasmā sāmaññato,
anya-e0103n7:70_1: visesato ca ekekapaduddhārena sabbadhamme buddho, tasmā vuttaṁ. Kinti āha “sammā
anya-e0103n7:70_2: sāmañca sabbadhammānaṁ buddhattā”ti, sabbassapi ñeyyassa sabbākārato aviparītaṁ sayameva
anya-e0103n7:70_3: abhisambuddhattāti attho. Imināssa paropadesarahitassa sabbākārena sabbadhammāvabodhanasamatthassa
anya-e0103n7:71_0: Nanu ca sabbaññutaññāṇato aññaṁ anāvaraṇañāṇaṁ, aññathā “cha asādhāraṇañāṇāni buddhañāṇānī”ti
anya-e0103n7:71_1: vacanaṁ virujjheyyāti? Na virujjhati, visayapavattibhedavasena aññehi asādhāraṇabhāvadassanatthaṁ
anya-e0103n7:71_2: ekasseva ñāṇassa dvidhā vuttattā. Ekameva hi taṁ ñāṇaṁ anavasesasaṅkhatāsaṅkhatasammutidhammavisayatāya
anya-e0103n7:71_4: vuttaṁ. Yathāha paṭisambhidāyaṁ “sabbaṁ saṅkhatamasaṅkhataṁ anavasesaṁ jānātīti sabbaññutaññāṇaṁ,
anya-e0103n7:71_5: tattha āvaraṇaṁ natthīti anāvaraṇañāṇa”ntiādi. Tasmā natthi nesaṁ atthato bhedo,
anya-e0103n7:71_6: ekantena cetaṁ evamicchitabbaṁ. Aññathā sabbaññutānāvaraṇañāṇānaṁ sādhāraṇatā, asabbadhammārammaṇatā
anya-e0103n7:71_7: ca āpajjeyya. Na hi bhagavato ñāṇassa aṇumattampi āvaraṇaṁ atthi, anāvaraṇañāṇassa
anya-e0103n7:71_8: ca asabbadhammārammaṇabhāve yattha taṁ na pavattati, tatthāvaraṇasabbhāvato anāvaraṇabhāvoyeva
anya-e0103n7:71_9: na siyā. Atha vā pana hotu aññameva anāvaraṇañāṇaṁ sabbaññutaññāṇato, idha pana sabbattha
anya-e0103n7:71_10: appaṭihatavuttitāya anāvaraṇañāṇanti sabbaññutaññāṇameva adhippetaṁ. Tassa cādhigamena
anya-e0103n7:71_11: bhagavā “sabbaññū, sabbavidū, sammāsambuddho”ti ca vuccati na sakiṁyeva sabbadhammāvabodhato.
anya-e0103n7:71_12: Tathā ca vuttaṁ paṭisambhidāyaṁ “vimokkhantikametaṁ buddhānaṁ bhagavantānaṁ bodhiyā
anya-e0103n7:71_13: mūle saha sabbaññutaññāṇassa paṭilābhā sacchikā paññatti yadidaṁ “buddho”ti. Sabbadhammāvabodhanasamatthañāṇasamadhigamena
anya-e0103n7:71_14: hi bhagavato santāne anavasesadhamme paṭivijjhituṁ samatthatā ahosīti.
anya-e0103n7:72_0: Etthāha – kiṁ panidaṁ ñāṇaṁ pavattamānaṁ sakiṁyeva sabbasmiṁ visaye pavattati, udāhu
anya-e0103n7:72_1: kamenāti? Kiñcettha – yadi tāva sakiṁyeva sabbasmiṁ visaye pavattati, atītānāgatapaccuppannaajjhattabahiddhādibhedabhinnānaṁ
anya-e0103n7:72_2: saṅkhatadhammānaṁ, asaṅkhatasammutidhammānañca ekajjhaṁ upaṭṭhāne dūrato cittapaṭaṁ
anya-e0103n7:72_3: pekkhantassa viya paṭivibhāgenāvabodho na siyā, tathā ca sati “sabbe dhammā anattā”ti
anya-e0103n7:72_4: vipassantānaṁ anattākārena viya sabbadhammā anirūpitarūpena bhagavato ñāṇassa visayā
anya-e0103n7:72_5: hontīti āpajjati. Yepi “sabbañeyyadhammānaṁ ṭhitalakkhaṇavisayaṁ vikapparahitaṁ sabbakālaṁ
anya-e0103n7:72_6: buddhānaṁ ñāṇaṁ pavattati, tena te ‘sabbavidū’ti vuccanti, evañca katvā ‘caraṁ samāhito
anya-e0103n7:72_7: nāgo, tiṭṭhantopi samāhito’ti idampi vacanaṁ suvuttaṁ hotī”ti vadanti, tesampi vuttadosānātivatti,
anya-e0103n7:72_9: bhagavato ñāṇaṁ siyā. Tasmā sakiṁyeva ñāṇaṁ pavattatīti na yujjati.
anya-e0103n7:73_0: Atha kamena sabbasmiṁ visaye ñāṇaṁ pavattati? Evampi na yujjati. Na hi jātibhūmisabhāvādivasena,
anya-e0103n7:73_1: disādesakālādivasena ca anekabhedabhinne ñeyye kamena gayhamāne tassa anavasesapaṭivedho
anya-e0103n7:73_2: sambhavati, apariyantabhāvato ñeyyassa. Ye pana “atthassa avisaṁvādanato ñeyyassa
anya-e0103n7:73_3: ekadesaṁ paccakkhaṁ katvā ‘sesepi eva’nti adhimuccitvā vavatthāpanena sabbaññū bhagavā,
anya-e0103n7:73_4: tañca ñāṇaṁ na anumānikaṁ saṁsayābhāvato. Saṁsayānubaddhaṁ hi loke anumānañāṇa”nti
anya-e0103n7:73_5: vadanti, tesampi taṁ na yuttaṁ. Sabbassa hi appaccakkhabhāve atthāvisaṁvādanena ñeyyassa
anya-e0103n7:73_6: ekadesaṁ paccakkhaṁ katvā “sesepi eva”nti adhimuccitvā vavatthāpanassa asambhavato.
anya-e0103n7:74_0: Atha tampi paccakkhaṁ, tassa sesabhāvo eva na siyāti? Sabbametaṁ akāraṇaṁ. Kasmā
anya-e0103n7:74_1: ? Avisayavicāraṇabhāvato. Vuttaṁ hetaṁ bhagavatā “buddhavisayo, bhikkhave, acinteyyo
anya-e0103n7:74_2: na cintetabbo. Yo cinteyya, ummādassa vighātassa bhāgī assā”ti. Idaṁ panettha sanniṭṭhānaṁ
anya-e0103n7:74_3: – yaṁkiñci bhagavatā ñātuṁ icchitaṁ sakalaṁ, ekadeso vā, tattha appaṭihatavuttitāya
anya-e0103n7:74_4: paccakkhato ñāṇaṁ pavattati, niccasamādhānañca vikkhepābhāvato. Ñātuṁ icchitassa
anya-e0103n7:74_5: ca sakalassa avisayabhāve tassa ākaṅkhappaṭibaddhavuttitā na siyā, ekanteneva sā
anya-e0103n7:74_6: icchitabbā “sabbe dhammā buddhassa bhagavato āvajjanappaṭibaddhā ākaṅkhappaṭibaddhā
anya-e0103n7:75_0: Nanu ca etasmiṁ pakkhe yadā sakalaṁ ñātuṁ icchitaṁ, tadā sakiṁyeva sakalavisayatāya
anya-e0103n7:75_1: anirūpitarūpena bhagavato ñāṇaṁ pavatteyyāti vuttadosānātivattiyevāti? Na, tassa
anya-e0103n7:75_2: visodhitattā. Visodhito hi so buddhavisayo acinteyyoti. Aññathā pacurajanañāṇasamānavuttitāya
anya-e0103n7:75_3: buddhānaṁ bhagavantānaṁ ñāṇassa acinteyyatā na siyā. Tasmā sakaladhammārammaṇampi
anya-e0103n7:75_4: taṁ ekadhammārammaṇaṁ viya suvavatthāpiteyeva te dhamme katvā pavattatīti idamettha
anya-e0103n7:75_5: acinteyyaṁ. Vuttañhetaṁ “yāvatakaṁ ñeyyaṁ, tāvatakaṁ ñāṇaṁ. Yāvatakaṁ ñāṇaṁ, tāvatakaṁ
anya-e0103n7:75_6: ñeyyaṁ. Ñeyyapariyantikaṁ ñāṇaṁ, ñāṇapariyantikaṁ ñeyya”nti. Evamekajjhaṁ, visuṁ,
anya-e0103n7:75_7: sakiṁ, kamena vā icchānurūpaṁ sammā sāmañca sabbadhammānaṁ buddhattā sammāsambuddho.
anya-e0103n7:76_0: 133.Vijjāhīti ettha vindiyaṁ vindatīti vijjā, yāthāvato upalabbhatīti attho. Attano
anya-e0103n7:76_1: vā paṭipakkhassa vijjhanaṭṭhena vijjā, tamokkhandhādikassa padālanaṭṭhenāti attho.
anya-e0103n7:76_2: Tato eva attano visayassa viditakaraṇaṭṭhenapi vijjā. Sampannattāti samannāgatattā,
anya-e0103n7:76_3: paripuṇṇattā vā, avikalattāti attho. Tissannaṁ, aṭṭhannaṁ ca vijjānaṁ tattha tattha
anya-e0103n7:76_4: sutte gahaṇaṁ vineyyajjhāsayavasenāti daṭṭhabbaṁ. Satta saddhammā nāma saddhā hirī
anya-e0103n7:76_5: ottappaṁ bāhusaccaṁ vīriyaṁ sati paññā ca. Ye sandhāya vuttaṁ “idha bhikkhu saddho
anya-e0103n7:76_6: hotī”tiādi. Cattāri jhānānīti yāni kānici cattāri rūpāvacarajjhānāni.
anya-e0103n7:77_0: Kasmā panettha sīlādayo pannaraseva “caraṇa”nti vuttāti codanaṁ sandhāyāha “imeyeva
anya-e0103n7:77_1: hī”tiādi. Tena tesaṁ sikkhattayasaṅgahato nibbānupagamane ekaṁsato sādhanabhāvamāha.
anya-e0103n7:77_2: Idāni tadatthasādhanāya āgamaṁ dassento “yathāhā”tiādimāha. Bhagavātiādi vuttassevatthassa
anya-e0103n7:78_0: Nanu cāyaṁ vijjācaraṇasampadā sāvakesupi labbhatīti? Kiñcāpi labbhati, na pana tathā,
anya-e0103n7:78_1: yathā bhagavatoti dassetuṁ “tattha vijjāsampadā”tiādi vuttaṁ. Caraṇadhammapariyāpannattā
anya-e0103n7:78_2: karuṇābrahmavihārassa, so cettha mahaggatabhāvappattā sādhāraṇabhāvoti āha “caraṇasampadā
anya-e0103n7:78_3: mahākāruṇikataṁ pūretvā ṭhitā”ti. Yathā sattānaṁ anatthaṁ parivajjetvā atthe niyojanaṁ
anya-e0103n7:78_4: paññāya vinā na hoti, evaṁ nesaṁ atthānatthajānanaṁ satthu karuṇāya vinā na hotīti
anya-e0103n7:78_5: ubhayampi ubhayattha sakiccakameva siyā. Yattha pana yassā padhānabhāvo, taṁ dassetuṁ
anya-e0103n7:78_6: “so sabbaññutāyā”tiādi vuttaṁ. Tattha yathā taṁ vijjācaraṇasampannoti yathā aññopi
anya-e0103n7:78_7: vijjācaraṇasampanno, tena vijjācaraṇasampannassevāyaṁ āveṇikā paṭipattīti dasseti.
anya-e0103n7:78_8: Sā panāyaṁ satthu vijjācaraṇasampadā sāsanassa niyyānikatāya sāvakānaṁ sammāpaṭipattiyā
anya-e0103n7:79_0: Ettha ca vijjāsampadāya satthu paññāmahattaṁ pakāsitaṁ hoti, caraṇasampadāya karuṇāmahattaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:79_1: Tesu paññāya bhagavato dhammarajjappatti, karuṇāya dhammasaṁvibhāgo. Paññāya saṁsāradukkhanibbidā,
anya-e0103n7:79_2: karuṇāya saṁsāradukkhasahanaṁ. Paññāya paradukkhaparijānanaṁ, karuṇāya paradukkhapatikārārambho.
anya-e0103n7:79_3: Paññāya parinibbānābhimukhabhāvo, karuṇāya tadadhigamo. Paññāya sayaṁ taraṇaṁ, karuṇāya
anya-e0103n7:79_4: paresaṁ tāraṇaṁ. Paññāya buddhabhāvasiddhi, karuṇāya buddhakiccasiddhi. Karuṇāya
anya-e0103n7:79_5: vā bodhisattabhūmiyaṁ saṁsārābhimukhabhāvo, paññāya tattha anabhirati. Tathā karuṇāya
anya-e0103n7:79_6: paresaṁ abhiṁsāpanaṁ, paññāya sayaṁ parehi abhāyanaṁ. Karuṇāya paraṁ rakkhanto attānaṁ
anya-e0103n7:79_7: rakkhati, paññāya attānaṁ rakkhanto paraṁ rakkhati. Tathā karuṇāya aparantapo, paññāya
anya-e0103n7:79_8: anattantapo. Tena attahitāya paṭipannādīsu catūsu puggalesu catutthapuggalabhāvo
anya-e0103n7:79_9: siddho hoti. Tathā karuṇāya lokanāthatā, paññāya attanāthatā. Karuṇāya cassa ninnatābhāvo,
anya-e0103n7:79_10: paññāya unnamābhāvo. Tathā karuṇāya sabbasattesu janitānuggaho paññānugatattā na
anya-e0103n7:79_11: ca na sabbattha virattacitto, paññāya sabbadhammesu virattacitto karuṇānugatattā
anya-e0103n7:79_12: na ca na sabbasattānuggahāya pavatto. Yathā hi karuṇā bhagavato sinehasokavirahitā,
anya-e0103n7:79_13: evaṁ paññā ahaṁkāramamaṁkāravinimuttāti aññamaññavisodhitā paramavisuddhā guṇavisesā
anya-e0103n7:80_0: 134.Gamanampi hi gatanti vuccati “gate ṭhite”tiādīsu. Sobhananti subhaṁ. Subhabhāvo
anya-e0103n7:80_1: visuddhatāya, visuddhatā dosavigamenāti āha “parisuddhamanavajja”nti. Gamanañca nāma
anya-e0103n7:80_2: bahuvidhanti idhādhippetaṁ gamanaṁ dassento “ariyamaggo”ti āha. So hi nibbānassa
anya-e0103n7:80_3: gati adhigamoti katvā “gataṁ, gamana”nti ca vuccati. Idāni tasseva gahaṇe kāraṇaṁ
anya-e0103n7:80_4: dassetuṁ “tena hesā”tiādi vuttaṁ. Khemaṁ disanti nibbānaṁ. Asajjamānoti paripanthābhāvena
anya-e0103n7:80_5: sugatigamanepi asajjanto saṅgaṁ akaronto, pageva itarattha. Atha vā ekāsane nisīditvā
anya-e0103n7:80_6: khippabhiññāvaseneva catunnampi maggānaṁ paṭiladdhabhāvato asajjamāno asajjanto gato.
anya-e0103n7:80_7: Yaṁ gamanaṁ gacchanto sabbamanatthaṁ apaharati, sabbañca anuttaraṁ sampattiṁ āvahati,
anya-e0103n7:80_8: tadeva sobhanaṁ nāma. Tena ca bhagavā gatoti āha “iti sobhanagamanattā sugato”ti
anya-e0103n7:81_0: Asundarānaṁ dukkhānaṁ saṅkhārappavattīnaṁ abhāvato accantasukhattā ekantato sundaraṁ
anya-e0103n7:81_1: nāma asaṅkhatā dhātūti āha “sundarañcesa ṭhānaṁ gato amataṁ nibbāna”nti. Tenāha bhagavā
anya-e0103n7:81_2: “nibbānaṁ paramaṁ sukha”nti. Sammāti suṭṭhu. Suṭṭhu gamanañca nāma paṭipakkhena anabhibhūtassa
anya-e0103n7:81_3: gamananti āha “pahīne kilese puna apaccāgacchanto”ti. Idañca sikhāppattaṁ sammāgamanaṁ,
anya-e0103n7:81_4: yāya āgamanīyapaṭipadāya siddhaṁ, sāpi sammāgamanamevāti evampi bhagavā sugatoti
anya-e0103n7:81_5: dassetuṁ “sammā vā gato”tiādi vuttaṁ. Sammāpaṭipattiyāti sammāsambodhiyā sampāpane
anya-e0103n7:81_6: aviparītapaṭipattiyā. “Sabbalokassa hitasukhameva karonto”ti etena mahābodhiyā paṭipadā
anya-e0103n7:81_7: avibhāgena sabbasattānaṁ sabbadā hitasukhāvahabhāveneva pavattatīti dasseti. “Sassataṁ
anya-e0103n7:81_8: ucchedanti ime ante anupagacchanto gato”ti etena paṭiccasamuppādagatiṁ dasseti. “Kāmasukhaṁ
anya-e0103n7:81_9: attakilamathanti ime anupagacchanto gato”ti etena ariyamaggagatiṁ dasseti.
anya-e0103n7:82_0: Tatrāti yuttaṭṭhāne yuttasseva bhāsane nipphādetabbe, sādhetabbe cetaṁ bhummaṁ. Abhūtanti
anya-e0103n7:82_1: abhūtatthaṁ. Atthamukhena hi vācāya abhūtatā, bhūtatā vā. Atacchanti tasseva vevacanaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:82_2: Abhūtanti vā asantaṁ avijjamānaṁ. Atacchanti atathākāraṁ aññathāsantaṁ. Anatthasañhitanti
anya-e0103n7:82_3: diṭṭhadhammikena, samparāyikena vā anatthena sañhitaṁ, anatthāvahaṁ. Na atthoti anattho,
anya-e0103n7:82_4: atthassa paṭipakkho, abhāvo ca, tena sañhitaṁ, pisuṇavācaṁ, samphappalāpañcāti attho.
anya-e0103n7:82_5: Evamettha catubbidhassāpi vacīduccaritassa saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Ettha ca paṭhamā vācā
anya-e0103n7:82_9: Catutthī “vedavihitena yaññavidhinā pāṇātipātādikataṁ sugatiṁ āvahatī”ti lokassa
anya-e0103n7:82_10: byāmohanakathā. Pañcamī bhūtena pesuññūpasaṁhārādikathā. Chaṭṭhā yuttappattaṭṭhāne
anya-e0103n7:82_11: pavattitā dānasīlādikathā veditabbā. Evaṁ sammā gadattāti yathāvuttaṁ abhūtādiṁ vajjetvā
anya-e0103n7:82_12: bhūtaṁ tacchaṁ atthasañhitaṁ piyaṁ manāpaṁ tato eva sammā suṭṭhu gadanato sugato
anya-e0103n7:82_13: da-kārassa ta-kāraṁ katvā. Āpāthagamanamattena kassaci appiyampi hi bhagavato vacanaṁ
anya-e0103n7:83_0: Apica sobhanaṁ gataṁ gamanaṁ etassāti sugato. Bhagavato hi veneyyajanupasaṅkamanaṁ
anya-e0103n7:83_1: ekantena tesaṁ hitasukhanipphādanato sobhanaṁ bhaddakaṁ. Tathā lakkhaṇānubyañjanapaṭimaṇḍitarūpakāyatāya
anya-e0103n7:83_4: yāva mahābodhi anavajjatāya, sattānaṁ hitasukhāvahatāya ca sobhanameva. Atha vā sayambhūñāṇena
anya-e0103n7:83_5: sakalampi lokaṁ pariññābhisamayavasena parijānanto sammā gato avagatoti sugato. Tathā
anya-e0103n7:83_6: lokasamudayaṁ pahānābhisamayavasena pajahanto anuppattidhammataṁ āpādento sammā gato
anya-e0103n7:83_7: atītoti sugato. Lokanirodhaṁ nibbānaṁ sacchikiriyābhisamayavasena sammā gato adhigatoti
anya-e0103n7:83_8: sugato. Lokanirodhagāminiṁ paṭipadaṁ bhāvanābhisamayavasena sammā gato paṭipannoti
anya-e0103n7:83_9: sugato. Tathā yaṁ imassa sadevakassa lokassa diṭṭhaṁ sutaṁ mutaṁ viññātaṁ pattaṁ
anya-e0103n7:83_10: pariyesitaṁ anuvicaritaṁ manasā, sabbaṁ taṁ hatthatale āmalakaṁ viya sammā paccakkhato
anya-e0103n7:84_0: 135.Sabbathāti sabbappakārena. Yo yo loko yathā yathā veditabbo, tathā tathā. Te
anya-e0103n7:84_1: pana pakāre dassetuṁ “sabhāvato”tiādi vuttaṁ. Tattha sabhāvatoti dukkhasabhāvato.
anya-e0103n7:84_2: Sabbo hi loko dukkhasabhāvo. Yathāha “saṁkhittena pañcupādānakkhandhā dukkhā”ti.
anya-e0103n7:84_3: Samudayatoti yato so samudeti, tato taṇhādito. Nirodhatoti yattha so nirujjhati,
anya-e0103n7:84_4: tato visaṅkhārato. Nirodhūpāyatoti yena vidhinā so nirodho pattabbo, tato ariyamaggato,
anya-e0103n7:85_0: Iti “sabbathā lokaṁ avedī”ti vatvā tadatthasādhakaṁ suttaṁ dassento “yattha kho āvuso”tiādimāha.
anya-e0103n7:85_1: Tattha “na jāyatī”tiādinā ujukaṁ jātiādīni paṭikkhipitvā “na cavati na upapajjatī”ti
anya-e0103n7:85_2: padadvayena aparāparaṁ cavanupapajjanāni paṭikkhipati. Keci pana “na jāyatītiādi
anya-e0103n7:85_3: gabbhaseyyakavasena vuttaṁ, itaraṁ opapātikavasenā”ti vadanti. Tanti jātiādirahitaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:85_4: Gamanenāti padasā gamanena. Ñāteyyanti jānitabbaṁ. “Ñātāya”nti vā pāṭho, ñātā ayaṁ
anya-e0103n7:86_0: Kāmaṁ pādagamanena gantvā lokassantaṁ ñātuṁ, daṭṭhuṁ, pattuṁ vā na sakkā, apica parimitaparicchinnaṭṭhāne
anya-e0103n7:86_1: taṁ paññāpetvā dassemīti dassento “apicā”tiādimāha. Tattha sasaññimhīti saññāsahite.
anya-e0103n7:86_2: Tato eva samanake saviññāṇake. Aviññāṇake pana utusamuṭṭhānarūpasamudāyamatte paññāpetuṁ
anya-e0103n7:86_3: na sakkāti adhippāyo. Lokanti khandhādilokaṁ. Lokanirodhanti tassa lokassa nirujjhanaṁ,
anya-e0103n7:86_4: nibbānameva vā. Adesampi hi taṁ yesaṁ nirodho, tesaṁ vasena upacārato, desatopi niddisīyati
anya-e0103n7:86_5: yathā “cakkhuṁ loke piyarūpaṁ sātarūpaṁ, etthesā taṇhā pahīyamānā pahīyati, ettha
anya-e0103n7:87_0: Gamanenāti pākatikagamanena. Lokassantoti saṅkhāralokassa anto antakiriyāhetubhūtaṁ
anya-e0103n7:87_1: nibbānaṁ. Kudācananti kadācipi. Apatvāti aggamaggena anadhigantvā. Pamocananti pamutti
anya-e0103n7:87_2: nissaraṇaṁ. Tasmāti yasmā lokassantaṁ apatvā vaṭṭadukkhato mutti natthi, tasmā. Haveti
anya-e0103n7:87_3: nipātamattaṁ. Lokavidūti sabhāvādito sabbaṁ lokaṁ jānanto. Sumedhoti sundarapañño.
anya-e0103n7:87_4: Lokantagūti pariññābhisamayena lokaṁ viditvā pahānābhisamayena lokantagū. Maggabrahmacariyavāsassa
anya-e0103n7:87_5: pariniṭṭhitattā vusitabrahmacariyo. Sabbesaṁ kilesānaṁ samitattā, catusaccadhammānaṁ
anya-e0103n7:87_6: vā abhisamitattā samitāvī. Nāsīsati na pattheti. Yathā imaṁ lokaṁ, evaṁ parañca lokaṁ appaṭisandhikattā.
anya-e0103n7:88_0: 136. Evaṁ yadipi lokavidutā anavasesato dassitā sabhāvato dassitattā, loko pana ekadeseneva
anya-e0103n7:88_1: vuttoti taṁ anavasesato dassetuṁ “apica tayo lokā”tiādi vuttaṁ. Tattha indriyabaddhānaṁ
anya-e0103n7:88_2: khandhānaṁ samūho, santāno ca sattaloko. Rūpādīsu sattavisattatāya satto, lokīyanti
anya-e0103n7:88_3: ettha kusalākusalaṁ, tabbipāko cāti lokoti. Anindriyabaddhānaṁ rūpādīnaṁ samūho,
anya-e0103n7:88_4: santāno ca okāsaloko lokiyanti ettha tasā, thāvarā ca, tesañca okāsabhūtoti. Tadādhāratāya
anya-e0103n7:88_5: hesa “bhājanaloko”tipi vuccati. Ubhayepi khandhā saṅkhāraloko paccayehi saṅkharīyanti,
anya-e0103n7:88_6: lujjanti palujjanti cāti. Āhāraṭṭhitikāti paccayaṭṭhitikā, paccayāyattavuttikāti
anya-e0103n7:88_7: attho. Paccayattho hettha āhāra-saddo “ayamāhāro anuppannassa vā kāmacchandassa uppādāyā”tiādīsu
anya-e0103n7:88_8: viya. Evaṁ hi “sabbe sattā”ti iminā asaññasattāpi pariggahitā honti. Sā panāyaṁ āhāraṭṭhitikatā
anya-e0103n7:88_9: nippariyāyato saṅkhāradhammo, na sattadhammoti āha “āhāraṭṭhitikāti āgataṭṭhāne saṅkhāraloko veditabbo”ti.
anya-e0103n7:89_0: Yadi evaṁ “sabbe sattā”ti idaṁ kathanti? Puggalādhiṭṭhānā desanāti nāyaṁ doso. Yathā
anya-e0103n7:89_1: aññatthāpi “ekadhamme, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sammā nibbindamāno sammā virajjamāno sammā
anya-e0103n7:89_2: vimuccamāno sammā pariyantadassāvī sammadatthaṁ abhisamecca diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhassantakaro
anya-e0103n7:89_3: hoti. Katamasmiṁ ekadhamme? Sabbe sattā āhāraṭṭhitikā”ti. Diṭṭhigatikānaṁ sassatādivasena
anya-e0103n7:89_4: “attā, loko”ti ca parikappanā yebhuyyena sattavisayā, na saṅkhāravisayāti āha “sassato
anya-e0103n7:89_5: lokoti vā asassato lokoti vā āgataṭṭhāne sattaloko veditabbo”ti.
anya-e0103n7:90_0: Yāvatā candimasūriyā pariharantīti yattake ṭhāne candimasūriyā parivattanti paribbhamanti.
anya-e0103n7:90_1: Disā bhanti virocamānāti tesaṁ paribbhamaneneva tā disā pabhassarā hutvā virocanti.
anya-e0103n7:90_2: Tāva sahassadhā lokoti tattakaṁ sahassappakāro okāsaloko, sahassalokadhātuyoti attho.
anya-e0103n7:91_0: Tampīti taṁ tividhampi lokaṁ. Tathā hissa sabbathāpi viditoti sambandho. Eko lokoti
anya-e0103n7:91_1: “sabbe sattā āhāraṭṭhitikā”ti yāya puggalādhiṭṭhānāya kathāya sabbesaṁ saṅkhārānaṁ
anya-e0103n7:91_2: paccayāyattavuttitā vuttā, tāya sabbo saṅkhāraloko eko ekavidho pakārantarassa abhāvato.
anya-e0103n7:91_3: Dve lokātiādīsupi iminā nayena attho veditabbo. Nāma-ggahaṇena cettha nibbānassa
anya-e0103n7:91_4: aggahaṇaṁ, tassa alokasabhāvattā. Nanu ca “āhāraṭṭhitikā”ti ettha paccayāyattavuttitāya
anya-e0103n7:91_5: maggaphaladhammānampi lokatā āpajjatīti? Nāpajjati, pariññeyyānaṁ dukkhasaccadhammānaṁ
anya-e0103n7:91_6: idha “loko”ti adhippetattā. Atha vā “na lujjati na palujjatī”ti yo gahito tathā na
anya-e0103n7:91_7: hoti, so lokoti taṁgahaṇarahitānaṁ lokuttarānaṁ natthi lokatā. Upādānānaṁ ārammaṇabhūtā
anya-e0103n7:92_0: Ettha ca “āhāraṭṭhitikā”ti paccayāyattavuttitāvacanena saṅkhārānaṁ aniccatā. Tāya
anya-e0103n7:92_1: ca “yadaniccaṁ, taṁ dukkhaṁ. Yaṁ dukkhaṁ, tadanattā”ti vacanato dukkhānattatā ca
anya-e0103n7:92_2: pakāsitā hontīti tīṇipi sāmaññalakkhaṇāni gahitāni. Nāmanti cattāro arūpino khandhā,
anya-e0103n7:92_3: te ca atthato phassādayo. Rūpanti bhūtupādāyarūpāni, tāni ca atthato pathavīādayoti
anya-e0103n7:92_4: aviseseneva salakkhaṇato saṅkhārā gahitā. Taggahaṇeneva ye tesaṁ visesā kusalādayo,
anya-e0103n7:92_5: hetuādayo ca, tepi gahitā eva hontīti āha “iti ayaṁ saṅkhāralokopi sabbathā vidito”ti.
anya-e0103n7:93_0: Āgamma cittaṁ seti etthāti āsayo migāsayo viya. Yathā migo gocarāya gantvā paccāgantvā
anya-e0103n7:93_1: tattheva vanagahane sayatīti so tassa āsayo, evaṁ aññathā pavattitvāpi cittaṁ āgamma
anya-e0103n7:93_2: yattha seti, so tassa āsayoti vuccati. So pana sassatadiṭṭhiādivasena catubbidho. Vuttañca –
anya-e0103n7:96_0: Tattha sabbadiṭṭhīnaṁ sassatucchedadiṭṭhīhi saṅgahitattā sabbepi diṭṭhigatikā sattā
anya-e0103n7:96_1: imā eva dve diṭṭhiyo sannissitā. Yathāha “dvayanissito khvāyaṁ, kaccāna, loko yebhuyyena
anya-e0103n7:96_2: atthitañca natthitañcā”ti. Atthitāti hi sassataggāho adhippeto, natthitāti ucchedaggāho.
anya-e0103n7:96_3: Ayaṁ tāva vaṭṭanissitānaṁ puthujjanānaṁ āsayo. Vivaṭṭanissitānaṁ pana suddhasattānaṁ
anya-e0103n7:97: Āsayaṁ jānātīti catubbidhampi sattānaṁ āsayaṁ jānāti. Jānanto ca tesaṁ diṭṭhigatānaṁ, tesañca ñāṇānaṁ appavattikkhaṇepi jānāti. Vuttañhetaṁ –
anya-e0103n7:98: “Kāmaṁ sevantaññeva jānāti ‘ayaṁ puggalo kāmagaruko kāmāsayo kāmādhimutto’ti, kāmaṁ sevantaññeva jānāti ‘ayaṁ puggalo nekkhammagaruko nekkhammāsayo nekkhammādhimutto’ti”ādi.
anya-e0103n7:99_0: Appahīnabhāvena santāne anu anu sayantīti anusayā, anurūpaṁ kāraṇaṁ labhitvā uppajjantīti
anya-e0103n7:99_1: attho. Etena nesaṁ kāraṇalābhe uppajjanārahataṁ dasseti. Appahīnā hi kilesā kāraṇalābhe

anya-e0103n7:101_0: Adhimutti ajjhāsayadhātu. Sā duvidhā hīnādhimutti paṇītādhimuttīti. Yāya hīnādhimuttikā
anya-e0103n7:101_1: sattā hīnādhimuttikeyeva sevanti, paṇītādhimuttikā ca paṇītādhimuttikeyeva. Sā ajjhāsayadhātu

anya-e0103n7:103_1: saddhādīhi indriyehi samannāgate. Upanissayaindriyāni nāma idhādhippetāni. Svākāreti

anya-e0103n7:107_1: caturāsīti yojanasahassāniyeva ubbedho. Na kevalaṁ cettha ubbedhova, atha kho āyāmavitthārāpissa

anya-e0103n7:109_0: Tatoti sinerussa heṭṭhā, upari ca vuttappamāṇato. Upaḍḍhupaḍḍhenāti upaḍḍhena upaḍḍhena.
anya-e0103n7:109_1: Idaṁ vuttaṁ hoti – dvācattālīsa yojanasahassāni samudde ajjhogāḷho tattakameva ca
anya-e0103n7:109_2: upari uggato yugandharapabbato, ekavīsa yojanasahassāni samudde ajjhogāḷho tattakameva
anya-e0103n7:109_3: ca upari uggato īsadharo pabbatoti iminā nayena sesesupi upaḍḍhupaḍḍhapamāṇatā veditabbā.
anya-e0103n7:109_4: Yathā mahāsamuddo yāva cakkavāḷapādamūlā anupubbaninno, evaṁ yāva sinerupādamūlāti
anya-e0103n7:109_5: heṭṭhā sinerupamāṇato upaḍḍhapamāṇopi yugandharapabbato pathaviyaṁ suppatiṭṭhito,
anya-e0103n7:109_6: evaṁ īsadharādayopīti daṭṭhabbaṁ. Vuttaṁ hetaṁ “mahāsamuddo, bhikkhave, anupubbaninno
anya-e0103n7:109_7: anupubbapoṇo anupubbapabbhāro”ti. Sineruyugandharādīnaṁ antare sīdantarasamuddā nāma.
anya-e0103n7:109_8: Te vitthārato yathākkamaṁ sineruādīnaṁ accuggatasamānaparimāṇāti vadanti. Brahāti mahanto.

anya-e0103n7:115_0: Anantānīti aparimāṇāni, “ettakānī”ti aññehi minituṁ asakkuṇeyyāni. Bhagavā anantena
anya-e0103n7:115_1: buddhañāṇena avedi “ananto ākāso, ananto sattanikāyo, anantāni cakkavāḷānī”ti tividhampi
anya-e0103n7:115_2: anantaṁ buddhañāṇaṁ paricchindati sayampi anantattā. Yāvatakaṁ hi ñeyyaṁ, tāvatakaṁ
anya-e0103n7:115_3: ñāṇaṁ. Yāvatakaṁ ñāṇaṁ, tāvatakaṁ ñeyyaṁ. Ñeyyapariyantikaṁ ñāṇaṁ, ñāṇapariyantikaṁ
anya-e0103n7:115_4: ñeyyanti. Tena vuttaṁ “anantena buddhañāṇena avedī”ti. Anantatā cassa anantañeyyapaṭivijjhaneneva
anya-e0103n7:115_5: veditabbā tattha appaṭihatacārattā. Nanu cettha vivaṭṭādīnampi viditatā vattabbāti?
anya-e0103n7:115_6: Saccaṁ vattabbaṁ, sā pana parato abhiññākathāyaṁ āgamissatīti idha na gahitā.
anya-e0103n7:116_0: 138.Attanāti nissakkavacanametaṁ. Guṇehi attanā visiṭṭhatarassāti sambandho. Tara-ggahaṇaṁ
anya-e0103n7:116_1: cettha “anuttaro”ti padassa atthaniddesatāya kataṁ, na visiṭṭhassa kassaci atthitāya.
anya-e0103n7:116_2: Sadevake hi loke sadisakappopi nāma koci tathāgatassa natthi, kuto sadiso. Visiṭṭhe
anya-e0103n7:116_3: pana kā kathā. Kassacīti kassacipi. Abhibhavatīti sīlasampadāya upanissayabhūtānaṁ
anya-e0103n7:116_5: samudāgamato paṭṭhāya anaññasādhāraṇo savāsanapaṭipakkhassa pahīnattā ukkaṁsapāramippatto
anya-e0103n7:116_6: satthu sīlaguṇo. Tena bhagavā sadevakaṁ lokaṁ aññadatthu abhibhuyya pavattati, na
anya-e0103n7:116_7: sayaṁ kenaci abhibhuyyatīti adhippāyo. Evaṁ samādhiguṇādīsupi yathārahaṁ vattabbaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:116_8: Sīlādayo cete lokiyalokuttaramissakā veditabbā. Vimuttiñāṇadassanaṁ pana lokiyaṁ kāmāvacarameva.
anya-e0103n7:117_0: Yadi evaṁ, kathaṁ tena sadevakaṁ lokaṁ abhibhavatīti? Tassāpi ānubhāvato asadisattā.
anya-e0103n7:117_1: Tampi hi visayato, pavattito, pavatti ākārato ca uttaritarameva. Taṁ hi anaññasādhāraṇaṁ
anya-e0103n7:117_2: satthu vimuttiguṇaṁ ārabbha pavattati, pavattamānañca atakkāvacaraṁ paramagambhīraṁ
anya-e0103n7:117_3: saṇhasukhumaṁ savisayaṁ paṭipakkhadhammānaṁ suppahīnattā suṭṭhu pākaṭaṁ vibhūtataraṁ
anya-e0103n7:117_4: katvā pavattati, sammadeva ca vasībhāvassa pāpitattā, bhavaṅgaparivāsassa ca atiparittakattā
anya-e0103n7:118_0: Evaṁ sīlādiguṇehi bhagavato uttaritarassa abhāvaṁ dassetvā idāni sadisassāpi abhāvaṁ
anya-e0103n7:118_1: dassetuṁ “asamo”tiādi vuttaṁ. Tattha asamoti ekasmiṁ kāle natthi etassa sīlādiguṇena
anya-e0103n7:118_2: samā sadisāti asamo. Tathā asamehi atītānāgatabuddhehi samo, asamā vā samā etassāti
anya-e0103n7:118_3: asamasamo. Sīlādiguṇena natthi etassa paṭimāti appaṭimo. Sesapadadvayepi eseva nayo.
anya-e0103n7:118_4: Tattha upamāmattaṁ paṭimā, sadisūpamā paṭibhāgo, yugaggāhavasena ṭhito paṭipuggalo veditabbo.
anya-e0103n7:119_0: Na kho panāhaṁ samanupassāmīti mama samantacakkhunā hatthatale āmalakaṁ viya sabbalokaṁ
anya-e0103n7:119_1: passantopi tattha sadevake…pe… pajāya attanā attato sīlasampannataraṁ sampannatarasīlaṁ
anya-e0103n7:119_2: kañci puggalaṁ na kho pana passāmi, tādisassa abhāvatoti adhippāyo. Aggappasādasuttādīnīti ettha –

anya-e0103n7:120_1: arūpino vā saññino vā asaññino vā nevasaññināsaññino vā, tathāgato tesaṁ aggamakkhāyati

anya-e0103n7:133_0: 139.Dametīti sameti, kāyasamādīhi yojetīti attho. Taṁ pana kāyasamādīhi yojanaṁ yathārahaṁ

anya-e0103n7:133_10: etasmiṁ atthe vitthāretabbaṁ yathārahaṁ saṇhādīhi upāyehi vinayassa dīpanato.

anya-e0103n7:134_3: purisadammā”ti vuttāti katvā vuttaṁ. Ye pana vippakatadammabhāvā sabbathā dametabbataṁ
anya-e0103n7:134_4: nātivattā, te satte sandhāya “dantepi dametiyevā”ti vuttaṁ. Tepi hi purisadammā evāti,
anya-e0103n7:135_0: Atthapadanti atthābhibyañjakapadaṁ, vākyanti attho. Vākyena hi atthābhibyatti, na
anya-e0103n7:135_1: nāmādipadamattena. Ekapadabhāvena ca anaññasādhāraṇo satthu purisadammasārathibhāvo
