anya-e0103n7:135_5: dhāvati, attano kāyaṁ aparivattentoti adhippāyo. Satthārā pana damitā purisadammā
anya-e0103n7:135_6: ekiriyāpatheneva aṭṭha disā dhāvanti. Tenāha “ekapallaṅkeneva nisinnā”ti. Aṭṭha disāti
anya-e0103n7:135_7: ca nidassanamattametaṁ, lokiyehi agatapubbaṁ nirodhasamāpattidisaṁ, amatadisañca pakkhandanato.
anya-e0103n7:136_0: 140. Diṭṭhadhammo vuccati paccakkho attabhāvo, tattha niyuttoti diṭṭhadhammiko, idhalokattho.
anya-e0103n7:136_1: Kammakilesavasena samparetabbato sammā gantabbato samparāyo, paraloko, tattha niyuttoti
anya-e0103n7:136_2: samparāyiko, paralokattho. Paramo uttamo attho paramattho, nibbānaṁ. Tehi diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikaparamatthehi.
anya-e0103n7:136_3: Yathārahanti yathānurūpaṁ. Tesu atthesu yo yo puggalo yaṁ yaṁ arahati, tadanurūpaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:136_4: Anusāsatīti vineti tasmiṁ atthe patiṭṭhapeti, saha atthena vattatīti sattho, bhaṇḍamūlena
anya-e0103n7:136_5: vāṇijjāya desantaraṁ gacchanto janasamūho. Hitupadesādivasena paripāletabbo sāsitabbo
anya-e0103n7:136_6: so etassa atthīti satthā, satthavāho. So viya bhagavāti āha “satthā viyāti satthā,
anya-e0103n7:137_0: Idāni tamatthaṁ niddesapāḷinayena dassetuṁ “yathā satthavāho”tiādi vuttaṁ. Tattha
anya-e0103n7:137_1: sattheti satthike jane. Kaṁ tārenti etthāti kantāro, nirudako araññappadeso. Ruḷhīvasena
anya-e0103n7:137_2: pana itaropi araññappadeso tathā vuccati. Corakantāranti corehi adhiṭṭhitakantāraṁ.
anya-e0103n7:137_3: Tathā vāḷakantāraṁ. Dubbhikkhakantāranti dullabhabhikkhaṁ kantāraṁ. Tāretīti akhemantaṭṭhānaṁ
anya-e0103n7:137_4: atikkāmeti. Uttāretītiādi upasaggena padaṁ vaḍḍhetvā vuttaṁ. Atha vā uttāretīti khemantabhūmiṁ
anya-e0103n7:137_5: upanento tāreti. Nittāretīti akhemantaṭṭhānato nikkhāmento tāreti. Patāretīti pariggahetvā
anya-e0103n7:137_6: tāreti, hatthena pariggahetvā viya tāretīti attho. Sabbampetaṁ tāraṇuttāraṇādikhemaṭṭhāne
anya-e0103n7:137_7: ṭhapanamevāti āha “khemantabhūmiṁ sampāpetī”ti. Satteti veneyyasatte. Mahāgahanatāya,
anya-e0103n7:137_8: mahānatthatāya, dunnittharaṇatāya ca jātiyeva kantāro jātikantāro, taṁ jātikantāraṁ.
anya-e0103n7:138_0: Ukkaṭṭhaparicchedavasenāti ukkaṭṭhasattaparicchedavasena. Devamanussā eva hi ukkaṭṭhasattā,
anya-e0103n7:138_2: paricchindanavasena. Etanti “devamanussāna”nti etaṁ vacanaṁ. Bhagavatoti nissakkavacanaṁ
anya-e0103n7:138_3: yathā “upajjhāyato ajjhetī”ti, bhagavato santiketi vā attho. Upanissayasampattinti
anya-e0103n7:139_0: Gaggarāyāti gaggarāya nāma rañño deviyā, tāya vā kāritattā “gaggarā”ti laddhanāmāya.
anya-e0103n7:139_1: Sare nimittaṁ aggahesīti “dhammo eso vuccatī”ti dhammasaññāya sare nimittaṁ gaṇhi,
anya-e0103n7:139_2: gaṇhanto ca pasannacitto parisapariyante nipajji. Sannirumbhitvā aṭṭhāsīti tassa
anya-e0103n7:139_3: sīse daṇḍassa ṭhapitabhāvaṁ apassanto tattha daṇḍaṁ uppīḷetvā aṭṭhāsi. Maṇḍūkopi
anya-e0103n7:139_4: daṇḍe ṭhapitepi uppīḷitepi dhammagatena pasādena vissaramakarontova kālamakāsi. Devaloke
anya-e0103n7:139_5: nibbattasattānaṁ ayaṁ dhammatā, yā “kutohaṁ idha nibbatto, tattha kiṁ nu kho kammamakāsi”nti
anya-e0103n7:139_6: āvajjanā. Tasmā attano purimabhavassa diṭṭhattā āha “are ahampi nāma idhanibbatto”ti.
anya-e0103n7:140_0: Bhagavā jānantova mahājanassa kammaphalaṁ, buddhānubhāvañca paccakkhaṁ kātukāmo “ko
anya-e0103n7:140_1: me vandatī”ti gāthāya pucchi. Tattha koti devanāgayakkhagandhabbādīsu ko, katamoti
anya-e0103n7:140_2: attho. Meti mama. Pādānīti pāde. Iddhiyāti imāya evarūpāya deviddhiyā. “Yasasā”ti
anya-e0103n7:140_3: iminā edisena parivārena, paricchedena ca. Jalanti vijjotamāno. Abhikkantenāti ativiya
anya-e0103n7:140_4: kantena kamanīyena sundarena. Vaṇṇenāti chavivaṇṇena sarīravaṇṇanibhāya. Sabbā obhāsayaṁ
anya-e0103n7:140_5: disāti sabbā dasapi disā pabhāsento, cando viya, sūriyo viya ca ekobhāsaṁ ekālokaṁ karontoti attho.
anya-e0103n7:141_0: Evaṁ pana bhagavatā pucchito devaputto attānaṁ pavedento “maṇḍūkohaṁ pure āsi”nti
anya-e0103n7:141_1: gāthamāha. Tattha pureti purimajātiyaṁ. “Udake”ti idaṁ tadā attano uppattiṭṭhānadassanaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:141_2: “Udake maṇḍūko”ti etena uddhamāyikādikassa thale maṇḍūkassa nivattanaṁ kataṁ hoti.
anya-e0103n7:141_3: Gāvo caranti etthāti gocaro, gunnaṁ ghāsesanaṭṭhānaṁ. Idha pana gocaro viyāti gocaro,
anya-e0103n7:141_4: vāri udakaṁ gocaro etassāti vārigocaro. Udakacārīpi hi koci kacchapādi avārigocaropi
anya-e0103n7:141_5: hotīti “vārigocaro”ti visesetvā vuttaṁ. Tava dhammaṁ suṇantassāti brahmassarena karavīkarutamañjunā
anya-e0103n7:141_6: desentassa tava dhammaṁ “dhammo eso vuccatī”ti sare nimittaggāhavasena suṇantassa.
anya-e0103n7:141_7: Anādare cetaṁ sāmivacanaṁ. Avadhi vacchapālakoti vacche rakkhanto gopāladārako mama
anya-e0103n7:141_8: samīpaṁ āgantvā daṇḍamolubbha tiṭṭhanto mama sīse daṇḍaṁ sannirumbhitvā maṁ māresīti attho.
anya-e0103n7:142_0: Sitaṁ katvāti “tathā parittatarenāpi puññānubhāvena evaṁ ativiya uḷārā lokiyalokuttarā
anya-e0103n7:142_2: bhiyyoso mattāya taṁ padesaṁ obhāsento sitaṁ katvā. Pītisomanassavasena hi so –
anya-e0103n7:144: Ānubhāvañca me passa, vaṇṇaṁ passa jutiñca me.
anya-e0103n7:145: “Ye ca te dīghamaddhānaṁ, dhammaṁ assosuṁ gotama;
anya-e0103n7:146: Pattā te acalaṭṭhānaṁ, yattha gantvā na socare”ti. ;
anya-e0103n7:148_0: 141.Yaṁ pana kiñcīti ettha yanti aniyamitavacanaṁ. Tathā kiñcīti. Panāti vacanālaṅkāramattaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:148_1: Tasmā yaṁ kiñcīti ñeyyassa anavasesapariyādānaṁ kataṁ hoti. Panāti vā visesatthadīpako
anya-e0103n7:148_2: nipāto. Tena “sammāsambuddho”ti iminā saṅkhepato, vitthārato ca satthu catusaccābhisambodho
anya-e0103n7:148_3: vutto. “Buddho”ti pana iminā tadaññassapi ñeyyassāvabodho. Purimena vā satthu paṭivedhañāṇānubhāvo,
anya-e0103n7:148_4: pacchimena desanāñāṇānubhāvo. Pīti upari vuccamāno viseso jotīyati. Sabbaso paṭipakkhehi
anya-e0103n7:148_5: vimuccatīti vimokkho, aggamaggo. Tassa anto aggaphalaṁ, tattha bhavaṁ tasmiṁ laddhe
anya-e0103n7:148_6: laddhabbato vimokkhantikañāṇaṁ, sabbaññutaññāṇena saddhiṁ sabbampi buddhañāṇaṁ. Evaṁ pavattoti ettha –
anya-e0103n7:149_0: “Sabbaññutāya buddho, sabbadassāvitāya buddho, anaññaneyyatāya buddho, visavitāya
anya-e0103n7:149_1: buddho, khīṇāsavasaṅkhātena buddho, nirupalepasaṅkhātena buddho, ekantavītarāgoti
anya-e0103n7:149_2: buddho, ekantavītadosoti buddho, ekantavītamohoti buddho, ekantanikkilesoti buddho,
anya-e0103n7:149_3: ekāyanamaggaṁ gatoti buddho, eko anuttaraṁ sammāsambodhiṁ abhisambuddhoti buddho,
anya-e0103n7:149_4: abuddhivihatattā buddhipaṭilābhā buddho. Buddhoti netaṁ nāmaṁ mātarā kataṁ, na pitarā
anya-e0103n7:149_5: kataṁ, na bhātarā kataṁ, na bhaginiyā kataṁ, na mittāmaccehikataṁ, na ñātisālohitehi
anya-e0103n7:149_6: kataṁ, na samaṇabrāhmaṇehi kataṁ, na devatāhi kataṁ. Vimokkhantikametaṁ buddhānaṁ
anya-e0103n7:149_7: bhagavantānaṁ bodhiyā mūle saha sabbaññutaññāṇassa paṭilābhā sacchikā paññatti yadidaṁ buddho”ti –
anya-e0103n7:150: Ayaṁ niddesapāḷinayo. Yasmā cettha tassā paṭisambhidāpāḷiyā bhedo natthi, tasmā dvīsu ekenāpi atthasiddhīti dassanatthaṁ “paṭisambhidānayo vā”ti aniyamattho vā-saddo vutto.
anya-e0103n7:151_0: Tattha yathā loke avagantā “avagato”ti vuccati, evaṁ bujjhitā saccānīti buddho suddhakattuvasena.
anya-e0103n7:151_1: Yathā paṇṇasosā vātā “paṇṇasusā”ti vuccanti, evaṁ bodhetā pajāyāti buddho hetukattuvasena,
anya-e0103n7:152_0: Sabbaññutāya buddhoti sabbadhammabujjhanasamatthāya buddhiyā buddhoti attho. Sabbadassāvitāya
anya-e0103n7:152_1: buddhoti sabbadhammānaṁ ñāṇacakkhunā diṭṭhattā buddhoti attho. Anaññaneyyatāya buddhoti
anya-e0103n7:152_2: aññena abodhanīto sayameva buddhattā buddhoti attho. Visavitāya buddhoti nānāguṇavisavanato
anya-e0103n7:152_3: padumamiva vikasanaṭṭhena buddhoti attho. Khīṇāsavasaṅkhātena buddhoti evamādīhi
anya-e0103n7:152_4: chahi pariyāyehi niddakkhayavibuddho puriso viya sabbakilesaniddakkhayavibuddhattā
anya-e0103n7:152_5: buddhoti vuttaṁ hoti. Ekāyanamaggaṁ gatoti buddhoti gamanatthānaṁ buddhiatthatāya
anya-e0103n7:152_6: buddhiatthānampi gamanatthatā labbhatīti ekāyanamaggaṁ gatattā buddhoti vuccatīti
anya-e0103n7:152_7: attho. Eko anuttaraṁ sammāsambodhiṁ abhisambuddhoti buddhoti na parehi buddhattā
anya-e0103n7:152_8: buddho, atha kho sayameva anuttaraṁ sammāsambodhiṁ abhisambuddhattā buddhoti attho.
anya-e0103n7:152_9: Abuddhivihatattā buddhipaṭilābhā buddhoti buddhi buddhaṁ bodhoti anatthantaraṁ. Tattha
anya-e0103n7:152_10: yathā rattaguṇayogato ratto paṭo, evaṁ buddhaguṇayogato buddhoti ñāpanatthaṁ vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:152_11: Tato paraṁ buddhoti netaṁ nāmantiādi atthānugatāyaṁ paññattīti bodhanatthaṁ vuttanti
anya-e0103n7:152_12: evamettha imināpi kāraṇena bhagavā buddhoti veditabbaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:153_1: visiṭṭhassa tato eva sabbasattehi uttamassa garuno gāravavasena vuttavacanamidaṁ
anya-e0103n7:153_4: payogasampattiyā sadevamanussāya pajāya, accantupakāritāya ca aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu
anya-e0103n7:154_0: Bhagavāti vacanaṁ seṭṭhanti seṭṭhavācakaṁ vacanaṁ seṭṭhaguṇasahacaraṇato “seṭṭha”nti
anya-e0103n7:154_1: vuttaṁ. Atha vā vuccatīti vacanaṁ, attho. Tasmā yo “bhagavā”ti vacanena vacanīyo
anya-e0103n7:154_2: attho, so seṭṭhoti attho. Bhagavāti vacanamuttamanti etthāpi eseva nayo. Gāravayuttoti
anya-e0103n7:154_3: garubhāvayutto garuguṇayogato, garukaraṇaṁ vā sātisayaṁ arahatīti gāravayutto, gāravārahoti attho.
anya-e0103n7:155_0: Guṇavisesahetukaṁ “bhagavā”ti idaṁ bhagavato nāmanti saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṁ vitthārato
anya-e0103n7:155_1: vibhajitukāmo nāmaṁyeva tāva atthuddhāravasena dassento “catubbidhaṁ vā nāma”ntiādimāha.
anya-e0103n7:155_2: Tattha āvatthikanti avatthāya viditaṁ taṁ taṁ avatthaṁ upādāya paññattaṁ voharitaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:155_3: Tathā liṅgikaṁ tena tena liṅgena voharitaṁ. Nemittikanti nimittato āgataṁ. Adhiccasamuppannanti
anya-e0103n7:155_4: yadicchāya pavattaṁ, yadicchāya āgataṁ yadicchakaṁ. Paṭhamena ādi-saddena bālo, yuvā,
anya-e0103n7:155_5: vuḍḍhoti evamādiṁ saṅgaṇhāti, dutiyena muṇḍī, jaṭīti evamādiṁ, tatiyena bahussuto,
anya-e0103n7:155_6: dhammakathiko, jhāyīti evamādiṁ, catutthena aghamarisanaṁ pāvacananti evamādiṁ saṅgaṇhāti.
anya-e0103n7:155_8: “Vimokkhantika”nti iminā idaṁ nāmaṁ ariyāya jātiyā jātakkhaṇeyeva jātanti dasseti.
anya-e0103n7:155_9: Yadi vimokkhantikaṁ, atha kasmā aññehi khīṇāsavehi asādhāraṇanti āha “saha sabbaññutaññāṇassa
anya-e0103n7:155_10: paṭilābhā”ti. Buddhānañhi arahattaphalaṁ nipphajjamānaṁ sabbaññutaññāṇādīhi sabbehi
anya-e0103n7:155_11: buddhaguṇehi saddhiṁyeva nipphajjati. Tena vuttaṁ “vimokkhantika”nti. Sacchikā paññattīti
anya-e0103n7:155_12: sabbadhammānaṁ sacchikiriyānimittā paññatti. Atha vā sacchikā paññattīti paccakkhasiddhā
anya-e0103n7:155_13: paññatti. Yaṁguṇanimittā hi sā, te satthu paccakkhabhūtāti guṇā viya sāpi sacchikatā
anya-e0103n7:155_14: eva nāma hoti, na paresaṁ vohāramattenāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n7:156_0: 143.Vadantīti mahātherassa garubhāvato bahuvacanenāha, saṅgītikārehi vā katamanuvādaṁ
anya-e0103n7:156_1: sandhāya. Issariyādibhedo bhago assa atthīti bhagī. Akāsi bhagganti rāgādipāpadhammaṁ
anya-e0103n7:156_2: bhaggaṁ akāsi, bhaggavāti attho. Bahūhi ñāyehīti kāyabhāvanādikehi anekehi bhāvanākkamehi.
anya-e0103n7:156_3: Subhāvitattanoti sammadeva bhāvitasabhāvassa. Paccatte cetaṁ sāmivacanaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:158_0: “Bhagavāti gāravādhivacanametaṁ. Apica bhaggarāgoti bhagavā, bhaggadosoti bhagavā,
anya-e0103n7:158_1: bhaggamohoti bhagavā, bhaggamānoti bhagavā, bhaggadiṭṭhīti bhagavā, bhaggataṇhoti
anya-e0103n7:158_2: bhagavā, bhaggakilesoti bhagavā, bhaji vibhaji pavibhaji dhammaratananti bhagavā,
anya-e0103n7:158_3: bhavānaṁ antakaroti bhagavā, bhāvitakāyo bhāvitasīlo bhāvitacitto bhāvitapaññoti
anya-e0103n7:158_4: bhagavā, bhaji vā bhagavā araññavanapatthāni pantāni senāsanāni appasaddāni appanigghosāni
anya-e0103n7:158_5: vijanavātāni manussarāhasseyyakāni paṭisallānasāruppānīti bhagavā, bhāgī vā bhagavā
anya-e0103n7:158_7: attharasassa dhammarasassa vimuttirasassa adhisīlassa adhicittassa adhipaññāyāti
anya-e0103n7:158_8: bhagavā, bhāgī vā bhagavā catunnaṁ jhānānaṁ catunnaṁ appamaññānaṁ catunnaṁ arūpasamāpattīnanti
anya-e0103n7:158_9: bhagavā, bhāgī vā bhagavā aṭṭhannaṁ vimokkhānaṁ aṭṭhannaṁ abhibhāyatanānaṁ navannaṁ
anya-e0103n7:158_10: anupubbavihārasamāpattīnanti bhagavā, bhāgī vā bhagavā dasannaṁ saññābhāvanānaṁ dasannaṁ
anya-e0103n7:158_11: kasiṇasamāpattīnaṁ ānāpānassatisamādhissa asubhasamāpattiyāti bhagavā, bhāgī vā bhagavā
anya-e0103n7:158_12: catunnaṁ satipaṭṭhānānaṁ catunnaṁ sammappadhānānaṁ catunnaṁ iddhipādānaṁ pañcannaṁ
anya-e0103n7:158_13: indriyānaṁ pañcannaṁ balānaṁ sattannaṁ bojjhaṅgānaṁ ariyassa aṭṭhaṅgikassa maggassāti
anya-e0103n7:158_14: bhagavā, bhāgī vā bhagavā dasannaṁ tathāgatabalānaṁ catunnaṁ vesārajjānaṁ catunnaṁ
anya-e0103n7:158_15: paṭisambhidānaṁ channaṁ abhiññānaṁ channaṁ buddhadhammānanti bhagavā, bhagavāti netaṁ
anya-e0103n7:159_0: Ettha ca “gāravādhivacana”ntiādīni yadipi gāthāyaṁ āgatapadānukkamena na niddiṭṭhāni,
anya-e0103n7:159_1: yathārahaṁ pana tesaṁ sabbesampi niddesabhāvena veditabbāni. Tattha gāravādhivacananti
anya-e0103n7:159_2: garūnaṁ garubhāvavācakaṁ vacanaṁ. Bhajīti bhāgaso kathesi. Tenāha “vibhajī”ti. Dhammaratananti
anya-e0103n7:159_3: maggaphalādiariyadhammaratanaṁ. Puna bhajīti sevi. Bhāgīti bhāgadheyyavā. Puna bhāgīti
anya-e0103n7:159_4: bhajanasīlo. Attharasassāti atthasannissayassa rasassa. Vimuttāyatanasīse hi ṭhatvā
anya-e0103n7:159_5: dhammaṁ kathentassa, suṇantassa ca tadatthaṁ ārabbha uppajjanakapītisomanassaṁ attharaso.
anya-e0103n7:159_6: Dhammaṁ ārabbha dhammaraso. Yaṁ sandhāya vuttaṁ “labhati atthavedaṁ, labhati dhammaveda”nti.
anya-e0103n7:159_7: Vimuttirasassāti vimuttibhūtassa, vimuttisannissayassa vā rasassa. Saññābhāvanānanti
anya-e0103n7:159_8: aniccasaññādīnaṁ dasannaṁ saññābhāvanānaṁ. Channaṁ buddhadhammānanti cha asādhāraṇañāṇāni
anya-e0103n7:159_9: sandhāya vuttaṁ. Tattha tattha “bhagavā”ti saddasiddhi niruttinayena veditabbā.
anya-e0103n7:160_0: 144. Yadipi “bhāgyavā”tiādīhi padehi vuccamāno attho “bhagī bhajī”ti niddesagāthāya
anya-e0103n7:160_1: saṅgahito eva, tathāpi padasiddhi atthavibhāgaatthayojanādisahito saṁvaṇṇanānayo
anya-e0103n7:160_2: tato aññākāroti vuttaṁ “ayaṁ pana aparo nayo”ti. Ādikanti ādi-saddena vaṇṇavikāro,
anya-e0103n7:160_3: vaṇṇalopo, dhātuatthena niyojanañcāti imaṁ tividhaṁ lakkhaṇaṁ saṅgaṇhāti. Saddanayenāti
anya-e0103n7:160_5: gahetvā”ti. Pakkhipanameva lakkhaṇaṁ. Tappariyāpannatākaraṇaṁ hi pakkhipanaṁ. Pārappattanti
anya-e0103n7:160_6: paramukkaṁsagataṁ pāramibhāvappattaṁ. Bhāgyanti kusalaṁ. Tattha maggakusalaṁ lokuttarasukhanibbattakaṁ,
anya-e0103n7:160_7: itaraṁ lokiyasukhanibbattakaṁ, itarampi vā vivaṭṭūpanissayaṁ pariyāyato lokuttarasukhanibbattakaṁ siyā.
anya-e0103n7:161_0: Lobhādayo ekakavasena gahitā. Tathā viparītamanasikāro vipallāsabhāvasāmaññena, ahirikādayo
anya-e0103n7:161_1: dukavasena. Lobhādayo ca puna “tividhākusalamūla”nti tikavasena gahitā. Kāyaduccaritādi-taṇhāsaṁkilesādirāgamalādirāgavisamādikāmasaññādikāmavitakkāditaṇhāpapañcādayo
anya-e0103n7:161_3: taṇhā uppajjamānā uppajjati, piṇḍapāta, senāsana, itibhavābhavahetu vā”ti evamāgatā
anya-e0103n7:161_4: cattāro taṇhuppādā. “Buddhe kaṅkhati, dhamme, saṅghe, sikkhāya, sabrahmacārīsu kupito
anya-e0103n7:161_5: hoti anattamano āhatacitto khīlajāto”ti evamāgatāni pañca cetokhīlāni. “Kāme avītarāgo
anya-e0103n7:161_6: hoti, kāye avītarāgo, rūpe avītarāgo, yāvadatthaṁ udarāvadehakaṁ bhuñjitvā seyyasukhaṁ
anya-e0103n7:161_7: passasukhaṁ middhasukhaṁ anuyutto viharati, aññataraṁ devanikāyaṁ paṇidhāya brahmacariyaṁ
anya-e0103n7:161_8: caratī”ti āgatā pañca vinibandhā. Rūpābhinandanādayo pañcābhinandanā. Kodho, makkho,
anya-e0103n7:161_9: issā, sāṭheyyaṁ, pāpicchatā, sandiṭṭhiparāmāsoti imāni cha vivādamūlāni. Rūpataṇhādayo cha taṇhākāyā.
anya-e0103n7:162_1: aṭṭha micchattā. “Taṇhaṁ paṭicca pariyesanā, pariyesanaṁ paṭicca lābho, lābhaṁ paṭicca
anya-e0103n7:162_2: vinicchayo, vinicchayaṁ paṭicca chandarāgo, chandarāgaṁ paṭicca ajjhosānaṁ, ajjhosānaṁ
anya-e0103n7:162_3: paṭicca pariggaho, pariggahaṁ paṭicca macchariyaṁ, macchariyaṁ paṭicca ārakkhā, ārakkhādhikaraṇaṁ
anya-e0103n7:162_4: daṇḍādānādayo”ti ete nava taṇhāmūlakā. Cattāro sassatavādā, cattāro ekaccasassatavādā,
anya-e0103n7:162_5: cattāro antānantikā, cattāro amarāvikkhepikā, dve adhiccasamuppannikā, soḷasa saññīvādā,
anya-e0103n7:162_6: aṭṭha asaññīvādā, aṭṭha nevasaññīnāsaññīvādā, satta ucchedavādā, pañca paramadiṭṭhadhammanibbānavādāti
anya-e0103n7:162_7: etāni dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhigatāni. Ajjhattikassa upādāya “asmī”ti hoti, “itthasmī”ti,
anya-e0103n7:162_10: siya”nti, “aññathā siya”nti, “apāhaṁ siya”nti, “apāhaṁ itthaṁ siya”nti, “apāhaṁ evaṁ
anya-e0103n7:162_11: siya”nti, “apāhaṁ aññathā siya”nti hotīti aṭṭhārasa, bāhirassupādāya “iminā asmī”ti
anya-e0103n7:162_12: hoti, “iminā itthasmī”ti, “iminā evasmī”ti, “iminā aññathāsmī”tiādikā vuttanayā aṭṭhārasāti
anya-e0103n7:162_13: chattiṁsa, atītā chattiṁsa, anāgatā chattiṁsa, paccuppannā chattiṁsāti aṭṭhasatataṇhāvicaritāni.
anya-e0103n7:163_0: Pabheda-saddo paccekaṁ sambandhitabbo. Tatthāyaṁ yojanā – lobhappabhedā dosappabhedā
anya-e0103n7:163_1: yāva aṭṭhasatataṇhāvicaritappabhedāti. Sabbāni sattānaṁ darathapariḷāhakarāni kilesānaṁ
anya-e0103n7:163_2: anekāni satasahassāni abhañjīti yojanā. Ārammaṇādivibhāgato hi pavattiākāravibhāgato
anya-e0103n7:163_3: ca anantappabhedā kilesāti. Saṅkhepatoti ettha samucchedappahānavasena sabbaso appavattikaraṇena
anya-e0103n7:163_6: devaputtamaccumārañca abhañji bhagge akāsi. Parissayānanti upaddavānaṁ. Sampati,
anya-e0103n7:163_7: āyatiñca sattānaṁ anatthāvahattā māraṇaṭṭhena vibādhanaṭṭhena kilesāva māroti kilesamāro.
anya-e0103n7:163_8: Vadhakaṭṭhena khandhāva māroti khandhamāro. Tathā hi vuttaṁ “vadhakaṁ rūpaṁ ‘vadhakaṁ
anya-e0103n7:163_10: māroti abhisaṅkhāramāro. Saṁkilesanimittaṁ hutvā guṇamāraṇaṭṭhena devaputtova māroti
anya-e0103n7:163_11: devaputtamāro. Sattānaṁ jīvitassa, jīvitaparikkhārānañca jānikaraṇena mahābādharūpattā
anya-e0103n7:164_1: dīpitā hoti, itarāsaṁ phalasampadānaṁ mūlabhāvato, adhiṭṭhānabhāvato ca. Dhammakāyasampatti
anya-e0103n7:164_2: dīpitā hoti, pahānasampadāpubbakattā ñāṇasampadādīnaṁ. Bhāgyavatāya lokiyānaṁ bahumatabhāvo.
anya-e0103n7:164_3: Bhaggadosatāya parikkhakānaṁ bahumatabhāvoti yojanā. Evaṁ ito paresupi yathāsaṅkhyaṁ
anya-e0103n7:164_4: yojetabbaṁ. Puññavantaṁ hi gahaṭṭhā khattiyādayo abhigacchanti, pahīnadosaṁ pabbajitatāpasaparibbājakādayo
anya-e0103n7:164_5: “dosavinayāya dhammaṁ desetī”ti. Abhigatānañca nesaṁ kāyacittadukkhāpanayane paṭibalabhāvo,
anya-e0103n7:164_6: āmisadānadhammadānehi upakārasabbhāvato. Rūpakāyaṁ tassa pasādacakkhunā, dhammakāyaṁ
anya-e0103n7:164_7: paññācakkhunā disvā dukkhadvayassa paṭippassambhanato upagatānañca tesaṁ āmisadānadhammadānehi
anya-e0103n7:164_8: upakāritā, “pubbe āmisadānadhammadānehi mayā ayaṁ lokaggabhāvo adhigato, tasmā tumhehipi
anya-e0103n7:164_9: evameva paṭipajjitabba”nti evaṁ sammāpaṭipattiyaṁ niyojanena abhigatānaṁ lokiyalokuttarasukhehi
anya-e0103n7:165_0: Sakacitte issariyaṁ attano cittassa vasībhāvāpādanaṁ, yena paṭikkūlādīsu appaṭikkūlasaññitādivihārasiddhi,
anya-e0103n7:165_2: ijjhanato. Aṇimālaghimādikanti ādi-saddena mahimā patti pākammaṁ īsitā vasitā yatthakāmāvasāyitāti
anya-e0103n7:165_3: ime chapi saṅgahitā. Tattha kāyassa aṇubhāvakaraṇaṁ aṇimā. Lahubhāvo laghimā ākāse
anya-e0103n7:165_4: padasā gamanādinā. Mahattaṁ mahimā kāyassa mahantatāpādanaṁ. Iṭṭhadesappatti patti.
anya-e0103n7:165_5: Adhiṭṭhānādivasena icchitanipphādanaṁ pākammaṁ. Sayaṁvasitā issarabhāvo īsitā. Iddhividhe
anya-e0103n7:165_6: vasībhāvo vasitā. Ākāsena vā gacchato, aññaṁ vā kiñci karoto yattha katthaci vosānappatti
anya-e0103n7:165_8: issariyaṁ. Taṁ pana bhagavato iddhividhantogadhaṁ, anaññasādhāraṇañcāti āha “sabbākāraparipūraṁ atthī”ti.
anya-e0103n7:166_0: Kesañci padesavutti, ayathābhūtaguṇasannissayattā aparisuddho ca yaso hoti, na evaṁ
anya-e0103n7:166_1: tathāgatassāti dassetuṁ “lokattayabyāpako”tiādi vuttaṁ. Tattha idha adhigatasatthuguṇānaṁ
anya-e0103n7:166_2: āruppe uppannānaṁ “itipi so bhagavā”tiādinā bhagavato guṇe anussarantānaṁ yaso pākaṭo
anya-e0103n7:166_3: hotīti āha “lokattayabyāpako”ti. Yathābhuccaguṇādhigatattā eva ativiya parisuddho.
anya-e0103n7:166_5: aṅgapaccaṅgānaṁ sobhā. “Tiṇṇo tāreyya”ntiādinā yaṁ yaṁ etena lokanāthena icchitaṁ
anya-e0103n7:167_1: na kevalaṁ vibhaṅgapāḷiyaṁ āgatā satipaṭṭhānādayova saṅgahitā, atha kho saṅgahādayo,
anya-e0103n7:167_2: samayavimuttādayo, ṭhapanādayo, tikapaṭṭhānādayo ca saṅgahitāti veditabbaṁ. Dukkhasaccassa
anya-e0103n7:167_3: pīḷanaṭṭho taṁsamaṅgino sattassa hiṁsanaṁ avipphārikatākaraṇaṁ. Saṅkhataṭṭho sameccasambhūyapaccayehi
anya-e0103n7:167_4: katabhāvo. Santāpaṭṭho dukkhadukkhatādīhi santappanaṁ paridahanaṁ. Vipariṇāmaṭṭho
anya-e0103n7:167_5: jarāya, maraṇena cāti dvidhā vipariṇāmetabbatā. Samudayassa āyūhanaṭṭho dukkhassa
anya-e0103n7:167_6: nibbattanavasena sampiṇḍanaṁ. Nidānaṭṭho “idaṁ taṁ dukkha”nti nidadantassa viya samuṭṭhāpanaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:167_7: Saṁyogaṭṭho saṁsāradukkhena saṁyojanaṁ. Palibodhaṭṭho maggādhigamassa nivāraṇaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:167_8: Nirodhassa nissaraṇaṭṭho sabbūpadhīnaṁ paṭinissaggasabhāvattā tato vinissaṭatā, tannissaraṇanimittatā
anya-e0103n7:167_9: vā. Vivekaṭṭho sabbasaṅkhāravisaṁyuttatā. Asaṅkhataṭṭho kenacipi paccayena anabhisaṅkhatatā.
anya-e0103n7:167_10: Amataṭṭho niccasabhāvattā maraṇābhāvo, sattānaṁ maraṇābhāvahetutā vā. Maggassa niyyānaṭṭho
anya-e0103n7:167_11: vaṭṭadukkhato niggamanaṭṭho. Hetuattho nibbānassa sampāpakabhāvo. Dassanaṭṭho accantasukhumassa
anya-e0103n7:167_12: nibbānassa sacchikaraṇaṁ. Ādhipateyyaṭṭho catusaccadassane sampayuttānaṁ ādhipaccakaraṇaṁ,
anya-e0103n7:167_13: ārammaṇādhipatibhāvo vā visesato maggādhipativacanato. Satipi hi jhānādīnaṁ ārammaṇādhipatibhāve
anya-e0103n7:167_14: “jhānādhipatino dhammā”ti evamādiṁ avatvā “maggādhipatino dhammā” icceva vuttaṁ,
anya-e0103n7:167_15: tasmā viññāyati “atthi maggassa ārammaṇādhipatibhāve viseso”ti. Ete ca pīḷanādayo
anya-e0103n7:167_16: soḷasākārā nāma. Kasmā panettha aññesu rogagaṇṭhādiākāresu vijjamānesu eteva pariggayhantīti?
anya-e0103n7:167_17: Salakkhaṇato ca saccantaradassanato ca āvibhāvato. Svāyamattho parato saccakathāyameva āvi bhavissati.
anya-e0103n7:168_1: Phalasamāpatti ariyavihāro. Kāmehi vivekaṭṭhakāyatāvasena ekībhāvo kāyaviveko. Paṭhamajjhānādinā
anya-e0103n7:168_2: nīvaraṇādīhi vivittacittatā cittaviveko. Upadhiviveko nibbānaṁ. Aññeti lokiyābhiññādike.
anya-e0103n7:169_0: Kilesābhisaṅkhāravasena bhavesu paribbhamanaṁ, so ca taṇhāppadhānoti vuttaṁ “taṇhāsaṅkhātaṁ
anya-e0103n7:169_1: gamana”nti. Vantanti ariyamaggamukhena uggiritaṁ puna apaccāvamanavasena chaḍḍitaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:169_2: Bhagavāti vuccati niruttinayenāti dassento āha “yathā…pe… mekhalā”ti.
anya-e0103n7:170: Aparo nayo – bhāgavāti bhagavā, bhatavāti bhagavā, bhāge vanīti bhagavā, bhage vanīti bhagavā, bhattavāti bhagavā, bhage vamīti bhagavā. Bhāge vamīti bhagavā.
anya-e0103n7:171: Bhāgavā bhatavā bhāge, bhage ca vani bhattavā;
anya-e0103n7:172: Bhage vami tathā bhāge, vamīti bhagavā jino.
anya-e0103n7:173_0: Tattha kathaṁ bhāgavāti bhagavā? Ye te sīlādayo dhammakkhandhā guṇakoṭṭhāsā, te anaññasādhāraṇā
anya-e0103n7:173_1: niratisayā tathāgatassa atthi upalabbhanti. Tathā hissa sīlaṁ samādhi paññā vimutti
anya-e0103n7:173_2: vimuttiñāṇadassanaṁ, hirī ottappaṁ, saddhā vīriyaṁ, sati sampajaññaṁ, sīlavisuddhi
anya-e0103n7:173_3: diṭṭhivisuddhi, samatho vipassanā, tīṇi kusalamūlāni, tīṇi sucaritāni, tayo sammāvitakkā,
anya-e0103n7:173_4: tisso anavajjasaññā, tisso dhātuyo, cattāro satipaṭṭhānā, cattāro sammappadhānā,
anya-e0103n7:173_5: cattāro iddhipādā, cattāro ariyamaggā, cattāri ariyaphalāni, catasso paṭisambhidā,
anya-e0103n7:173_6: catuyoniparicchedakañāṇāni, cattāro ariyavaṁsā, cattāri vesārajjañāṇāni, pañca padhāniyaṅgāni,
anya-e0103n7:173_7: pañcaṅgiko sammāsamādhi, pañcañāṇiko sammāsamādhi, pañcindriyāni, pañca balāni, pañca
anya-e0103n7:173_8: nissāraṇīyā dhātuyo, pañca vimuttāyatanañāṇāni, pañca vimuttiparipācanīyā saññā,
anya-e0103n7:173_9: cha anussatiṭṭhānāni, cha gāravā, cha nissāraṇīyā dhātuyo, cha satatavihārā, cha
anya-e0103n7:173_10: anuttariyāni, cha nibbedhabhāgiyā saññā, cha abhiññā, cha asādhāraṇañāṇāni, satta
anya-e0103n7:173_11: aparihāniyā dhammā, satta ariyadhammā, satta ariyadhanāni, satta bojjhaṅgā, satta
anya-e0103n7:173_12: sappurisadhammā, satta nijjaravatthūni, satta saññā, sattadakkhiṇeyyapuggaladesanā,
anya-e0103n7:173_14: aṭṭha sammattāni, aṭṭhalokadhammātikkamā, aṭṭha ārambhavatthūni, aṭṭhaakkhaṇadesanā,
anya-e0103n7:173_15: aṭṭha mahāpurisavitakkā, aṭṭhaabhibhāyatanadesanā, aṭṭha vimokkhā, nava yonisomanasikāramūlakā
anya-e0103n7:173_16: dhammā, nava pārisuddhipadhāniyaṅgāni, navasattāvāsadesanā, nava āghātapaṭivinayā,
anya-e0103n7:173_17: nava saññā, nava nānattā, nava anupubbavihārā, dasa nāthakāraṇā dhammā, dasa kasiṇāyatanāni,
anya-e0103n7:173_18: dasa kusalakammapathā, dasa sammattāni, dasa ariyavāsā, dasa asekkhadhammā, dasa
anya-e0103n7:173_19: tathāgatabalāni, ekādasa mettānisaṁsā, dvādasa dhammacakkākārā, terasa dhutaguṇā,
anya-e0103n7:173_20: cuddasa buddhañāṇāni, pañcadasa vimuttiparipācanīyā dhammā, soḷasavidhā ānāpānassati,
anya-e0103n7:173_21: soḷasa aparantapanīyā dhammā, aṭṭhārasa buddhadhammā, ekūnavīsati paccavekkhaṇañāṇāni,
anya-e0103n7:173_22: catucattālīsa ñāṇavatthūni, paññāsa udayabbayañāṇāni, paropaññāsa kusaladhammā, sattasattatiñāṇavatthūni,
anya-e0103n7:173_24: tathā anantāsu lokadhātūsu anantānaṁ sattānaṁ āsayādivibhāvanañāṇāni cāti evamādayo
anya-e0103n7:173_25: anantāparimāṇabhedā anaññasādhāraṇā niratisayā guṇabhāgā guṇakoṭṭhāsā saṁvijjanti
anya-e0103n7:173_26: upalabbhanti. Tasmā yathāvuttavibhāgā guṇabhāgā assa atthīti bhāgavāti vattabbe ā-kārassa
anya-e0103n7:173_27: rassattaṁ katvā “bhagavā”ti vutto. Evaṁ tāva bhāgavāti bhagavā.
anya-e0103n7:176_0: Kathaṁ bhatavāti bhagavā? Ye te sabbalokahitāya ussukkamāpannehi manussattādike aṭṭha
anya-e0103n7:176_1: dhamme samodhānetvā sammāsambodhiyā katamahābhinīhārehi mahābodhisattehi paripūretabbā
anya-e0103n7:176_3: pāramiyo, dasa upapāramiyo, dasa paramatthapāramiyoti samatiṁsa pāramiyo, dānādīni
anya-e0103n7:176_4: cattāri saṅgahavatthūni, saccādīni cattāri adhiṭṭhānāni, attapariccāgo, nayana, dhana,
anya-e0103n7:176_5: rajja, puttadārapariccāgoti pañca mahāpariccāgā, pubbayogo, pubbacariyā, dhammakkhānaṁ,
anya-e0103n7:176_6: ñātatthacariyā, lokatthacariyā, buddhatthacariyāti evamādayo, saṅkhepato vā sabbe
anya-e0103n7:176_8: satasahassādhikāni cattāri asaṅkhyeyāni yathā hānabhāgiyā, saṁkilesabhāgiyā, ṭhitibhāgiyā
anya-e0103n7:176_9: vā na honti, atha kho uttaruttari visesabhāgiyāva honti, evaṁ sakkaccaṁ nirantaraṁ
anya-e0103n7:176_10: anavasesato bhatā sambhatā assa atthīti bhatavāti vattabbe “bhagavā”ti vutto niruttinayena
anya-e0103n7:176_11: ta-kārassa ga-kāraṁ katvā. Atha vā bhatavāti teyeva yathāvutte buddhakārakadhamme
anya-e0103n7:176_12: vuttanayena bhari sambhari, paripūresīti attho. Evampi bhatavāti bhagavā.
anya-e0103n7:178: Sambhāre bhatavā nātho, tasmāpi bhagavā mato.
anya-e0103n7:179_0: Kathaṁ bhāge vanīti bhagavā? Ye te catuvīsatikoṭisatasahassasaṅkhā devasikaṁ vaḷañjanakasamāpattibhāgā,
anya-e0103n7:179_1: te anavasesato lokahitatthaṁ, attano ca diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāratthaṁ niccakappaṁ
anya-e0103n7:179_2: niccakappaṁ vani bhaji sevi bahulamakāsīti bhāge vanīti bhagavā. Atha vā abhiññeyyadhammesu,
anya-e0103n7:179_3: kusalādīsu, khandhādīsu ca ye te pariññeyyādivasena saṅkhepato vā catubbidhā abhisamayabhāgā,
anya-e0103n7:179_4: vitthārato pana “cakkhuṁ pariññeyyaṁ…pe… jarāmaraṇaṁ pariññeyya”ntiādinā anekapariññeyyabhāgā,
anya-e0103n7:179_5: “cakkhussa samudayo pahātabbo…pe… jarāmaraṇassa samudayo pahātabbo”tiādinā pahātabbabhāgā,
anya-e0103n7:179_8: bhāvetabbabhāgā ca dhammā, te sabbe vani bhaji yathārahaṁ gocarabhāvanāsevanānaṁ
anya-e0103n7:179_9: vasena sevi. Evampi bhāge vanīti bhagavā. Atha vā ye ime sīlādayo dhammakkhandhā
anya-e0103n7:179_10: sāvakehi sādhāraṇā guṇakoṭṭhāsā guṇabhāgā, “kinti nu kho te veneyyasantānesu patiṭṭhapeyya”nti
anya-e0103n7:179_11: mahākaruṇāya vani abhipatthayi, sā cassa abhipatthanā yathādhippetaphalāvahā ahosi.
anya-e0103n7:181: Bhaji patthayi sattānaṁ, hitāya bhagavā tato.
anya-e0103n7:182_0: Kathaṁ bhage vanīti bhagavā? Samāsato tāva katapuññehi payogasampannehi yathāvibhavaṁ
anya-e0103n7:182_1: bhajīyantīti bhagā, lokiyalokuttarasampattiyo. Tattha lokiye tāva tathāgato sambodhito
anya-e0103n7:182_2: pubbe bodhisattabhūto paramukkaṁsagate vani bhaji sevi, yattha patiṭṭhāya niravasesato
anya-e0103n7:182_3: buddhakārakadhamme samannānento buddhadhamme paripācesi. Buddhabhūto pana te niravajjasukhūpasaṁhite
anya-e0103n7:182_4: anaññasādhāraṇe lokuttarepi vani bhaji sevi. Vitthārato pana padesarajjaissariyacakkavattisampattidevarajjasampattiādivasena,
anya-e0103n7:182_6: ca anekavihite anaññasādhāraṇe bhage vani bhaji sevi. Evampi bhage vanīti bhagavā.
anya-e0103n7:183: Yā tā sampattiyo loke, yā ca lokuttarā puthū;
anya-e0103n7:184: Sabbā tā bhaji sambuddho, tasmāpi bhagavā mato.
anya-e0103n7:185_0: Kathaṁ bhattavāti bhagavā? Bhattā daḷhabhattikā assa bahū atthīti bhattavā. Tathāgato
anya-e0103n7:185_5: suvisuddhena ca thutighosena samannāgatattā, ukkaṁsapāramippattāsu appicchatāsantuṭṭhiādīsu
anya-e0103n7:185_8: dhammappamāṇo dhammappasanno”ti evaṁ catuppamāṇike lokasannivāse sabbathāpi pasādāvahabhāvena
anya-e0103n7:185_10: paramapemasambhattiṭṭhānaṁ. Ye tassa ovāde patiṭṭhitā aveccappasādena samannāgatā
anya-e0103n7:185_11: honti, kenaci asaṁhāriyā tesaṁ sambhatti samaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā mārena
anya-e0103n7:185_12: vā brahmunā vāti. Tathā hi te attano jīvitapariccāgepi tattha pasādaṁ na pariccajanti,
anya-e0103n7:188_0: “Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, mahāsamuddo ṭhitadhammo velaṁ nātivattati, evameva kho, bhikkhave,
anya-e0103n7:188_1: yaṁ mayā sāvakānaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ paññattaṁ, taṁ mama sāvakā jīvitahetupi nātikkamantī”ti ca.
anya-e0103n7:189: Evaṁ bhattavāti bhagavā niruttinayena ekassa ta-kārassa lopaṁ katvā itarassa ga-kāraṁ katvā.
anya-e0103n7:191: Sambhattā bahavo satthu, bhagavā tena vuccati.
anya-e0103n7:192_0: Kathaṁ bhage vamīti bhagavā? Yasmā tathāgato bodhisattabhūtopi purimāsu jātīsu pāramiyo
anya-e0103n7:192_1: pūrento bhagasaṅkhātaṁ siriṁ, issariyaṁ, yasañca vami uggiri kheḷapiṇḍaṁ viya anapekkho
anya-e0103n7:192_2: chaḍḍayi. Tathā hissa somanassakumārakāle hatthipālakumārakāle ayogharapaṇḍitakāle
anya-e0103n7:192_4: rajjasiriyā pariccattaattabhāvānaṁ parimāṇaṁ natthi. Carimattabhāvepi hatthagataṁ
anya-e0103n7:192_6: sattaratanasamujjalaṁ yasañca tiṇāyapi amaññamāno nirapekkho pahāya abhinikkhamitvā
anya-e0103n7:192_7: sammāsambodhiṁ abhisambuddho, tasmā ime siriādike bhage vamīti bhagavā. Atha vā bhāni
anya-e0103n7:192_8: nāma nakkhattāni, tehi samaṁ gacchanti pavattantīti bhagā, sineruyugandharauttarakuruhimavantādibhājanalokavisesasannissayā
anya-e0103n7:192_9: sobhā kappaṭṭhiyabhāvato. Tepi bhagavā vami tannivāsasattāvāsasamatikkamanato tappaṭibaddhachandarāgappahānena
anya-e0103n7:195_0: Kathaṁ bhāge vamīti bhagavā? Bhāgā nāma sabhāvadhammakoṭṭhāsā, te khandhāyatanadhātādivasena,
anya-e0103n7:195_1: tatthāpi rūpavedanādivasena, atītādivasena ca anekavidhā, te ca bhagavā “sabbaṁ papañcaṁ,
anya-e0103n7:195_2: sabbaṁ yogaṁ, sabbaṁ ganthaṁ, sabbaṁ saṁyojanaṁ samucchinditvā amataṁ dhātuṁ samadhigacchanto
anya-e0103n7:195_3: vami uggiri anapekkho chaḍḍayi na paccāvami. Tathā hesa sabbatthakameva pathaviṁ
anya-e0103n7:195_4: āpaṁ tejaṁ vāyaṁ, cakkhuṁ sotaṁ ghānaṁ jivhaṁ kāyaṁ manaṁ, rūpe sadde gandhe rase
anya-e0103n7:195_5: phoṭṭhabbe dhamme, cakkhuviññāṇaṁ…pe… manoviññāṇaṁ, cakkhusamphassaṁ…pe… manosamphassaṁ,
anya-e0103n7:195_6: cakkhusamphassajaṁ vedanaṁ…pe… manosamphassajaṁ vedanaṁ, cakkhusamphassajaṁ saññaṁ…pe…
anya-e0103n7:195_7: manosamphassajaṁ saññaṁ, cakkhusamphassajaṁ cetanaṁ…pe… manosamphassajaṁ cetanaṁ,
anya-e0103n7:195_8: rūpataṇhaṁ …pe… dhammataṇhaṁ, rūpavitakkaṁ…pe… dhammavitakkaṁ, rūpavicāraṁ…pe… dhammavicāra”ntiādinā
anya-e0103n7:195_9: anupadadhammavibhāgavasenapi sabbeva dhammakoṭṭhāse anavasesato vami uggiri anapekkhapariccāgena
anya-e0103n7:196: “Yaṁ taṁ, ānanda, cattaṁ vantaṁ muttaṁ pahīnaṁ paṭinissaṭṭhaṁ, taṁ tathāgato puna paccāvamissatīti netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjatī”ti.
anya-e0103n7:197_0: Evampi bhāge vamīti bhagavā. Atha vā bhāge vamīti sabbepi kusalākusale sāvajjānavajje
anya-e0103n7:197_1: hīnapaṇīte kaṇhasukkasappaṭibhāge dhamme ariyamaggañāṇamukhena vami uggiri anapekkho
anya-e0103n7:197_2: pariccaji pajahi, paresañca tathattāya dhammaṁ desesi. Vuttampi cetaṁ –
anya-e0103n7:198: “Dhammāpi vo, bhikkhave, pahātabbā, pageva adhammā. Kullūpamaṁ vo, bhikkhave, dhammaṁ desessāmi nittharaṇatthāya, no gahaṇatthāyā”tiādi.
anya-e0103n7:201: Kaṇhā sukkā yato vantā, tatopi bhagavā mato.
anya-e0103n7:203: “Bhāgavā bhatavā bhāge, bhage ca vani bhattavā;
anya-e0103n7:204: Bhage vami tathā bhāge, vamīti bhagavā jino”ti.
anya-e0103n7:205_0: Ettha ca yasmā saṅkhepato attahitasampattiparahitapaṭipattivasena duvidhā buddhaguṇā,
anya-e0103n7:205_2: tadavinābhāvena tadantogadhattā. Parahitapaṭipatti payogāsayabhedato duvidhā. Tattha
anya-e0103n7:205_4: paṭiviruddhesupi niccaṁ hitesitā, ñāṇaparipākakālāgamanādiparahitapaṭipatti ca, āmisapaṭiggahaṇādināpi
anya-e0103n7:205_5: atthacariyā parahitapaṭipatti hotiyeva. Tasmā tesaṁ vibhāvanavasena pāḷiyaṁ “araha”ntiādīnaṁ
anya-e0103n7:206_0: Tattha “araha”nti iminā padena pahānasampadāvasena bhagavato attahitasampatti vibhāvitā.
anya-e0103n7:206_1: “Sammāsambuddho, lokavidū”ti ca imehi padehi ñāṇasampadāvasena. Nanu ca “lokavidū”ti
anya-e0103n7:206_2: imināpi sammāsambuddhatā vibhāvīyatīti? Saccaṁ vibhāvīyati, atthi pana viseso, “sammāsambuddho”ti
anya-e0103n7:206_3: iminā sabbaññutaññāṇānubhāvo vibhāvito, “lokavidū”ti pana iminā āsayānusayañāṇādīnampi
anya-e0103n7:206_4: ānubhāvo vibhāvitoti. “Vijjācaraṇasampanno”ti iminā sabbāpi bhagavato attahitasampatti
anya-e0103n7:206_5: vibhāvitā. “Sugato”ti pana iminā samudāgamato paṭṭhāya bhagavato attahitasampatti,
anya-e0103n7:206_6: parahitapaṭipatti ca vibhāvitā. “Anuttaro purisadammasārathi satthā devamanussāna”nti
anya-e0103n7:206_7: imehi padehi bhagavato parahitapaṭipatti vibhāvitā. “Buddho”ti iminā bhagavato attahitasampatti,
anya-e0103n7:206_8: parahitapaṭipatti ca vibhāvitā. Evañca katvā “sammāsambuddho”ti vatvā “buddho”ti
anya-e0103n7:206_9: vacanaṁ samatthitaṁ hoti. Tenevāha “attanāpi bujjhi aññepi satte bodhesī”tiādi. “Bhagavā”ti
anya-e0103n7:206_10: ca imināpi samudāgamato paṭṭhāya bhagavato sabbā attahitasampatti, parahitapaṭipatti ca vibhāvitā.
anya-e0103n7:207_0: Aparo nayo – hetuphalasattūpakāravasena saṅkhepato tividhā buddhaguṇā. Tattha “arahaṁ
anya-e0103n7:207_1: sammāsambuddho vijjācaraṇasampanno lokavidū”ti imehi padehi phalasampattivasena buddhaguṇā
anya-e0103n7:207_2: vibhāvitā. “Anuttaro purisadammasārathi satthā devamanussāna”nti imehi sattūpakāravasena
anya-e0103n7:207_3: buddhaguṇā pakāsitā. “Buddho”ti iminā phalavasena, sattūpakāravasena ca buddhaguṇā
anya-e0103n7:207_4: vibhāvitā. “Sugato bhagavā”ti pana imehi padehi hetuphalasattūpakāravasena buddhaguṇā
anya-e0103n7:208_1: Tasmiṁ samayeti buddhaguṇānussaraṇasamaye. Rāgapariyuṭṭhitanti rāgena pariyuṭṭhitaṁ,
anya-e0103n7:208_2: pariyuṭṭhānappattehi rāgehi sahitaṁ cittaṁ araññamiva corehi tena pariyuṭṭhitanti
anya-e0103n7:208_3: vuttaṁ, tassa pariyuṭṭhānaṭṭhānabhāvato, pariyuṭṭhitarāganti attho. Yaṁ vā rāgassa
anya-e0103n7:208_4: pariyuṭṭhānaṁ, taṁ taṁsahite citte upacaritanti daṭṭhabbaṁ. Etasmiṁ pakkhe rāgenāti
anya-e0103n7:208_5: rāgena hetunāti attho. Ujugatamevāti pageva kāyavaṅkādīnaṁ apanītattā, cittassa ca
anya-e0103n7:208_6: anujubhāvakarānaṁ māyādīnaṁ abhāvato, rāgādipariyuṭṭhānābhāvena vā onatiunnativirahato
anya-e0103n7:208_7: ujubhāvameva kataṁ. Atha vā ujugatamevāti kammaṭṭhānassa vīthiṁ otiṇṇatāya līnuddhaccavigamanato
anya-e0103n7:208_8: majjhimasamathanimittapaṭipattiyā ujubhāvameva gataṁ. Tathāgataṁ ārabbhāti tathāgataguṇe ārammaṇaṁ katvā.
anya-e0103n7:209_0: Iccassāti iti assa. “So bhagavā itipi araha”ntiādinā pubbe vuttappakārena buddhaguṇe
anya-e0103n7:209_1: anuvitakkayatoti sambandho. Evanti “neva tasmiṁ samaye”tiādinā vuttanayena. Buddhaguṇapoṇāti
anya-e0103n7:209_3: vitakkāhataṁ, vitakkapariyāhataṁ, punappunaṁ anumajjanañca karotīti dasseti. Pīti
anya-e0103n7:209_4: uppajjatīti bhāvanāvasena upacārajjhānanipphādikā balavatī pīti uppajjati. Pītimanassa
anya-e0103n7:209_6: sukhumāvatthā uddhaccasahagatā kilesā. Paṭippassambhantīti sannisīdanti. Anukkamena
anya-e0103n7:209_7: ekakkhaṇeti yadā buddhaguṇārammaṇā bhāvanā uparūpari visesaṁ āvahantī pavattati,
anya-e0103n7:209_8: tadā nīvaraṇāni vikkhambhitāneva honti, kilesā sannisinnāva honti, suvisadāni saddhādīni
anya-e0103n7:209_9: indriyāni honti, bhāvanāya paguṇatāya vitakkavicārā sātisayaṁ paṭukiccāva honti,
anya-e0103n7:209_10: balavatī pīti uppajjati, pītipadaṭṭhānā passaddhi savisesā jāyati, passaddhakāyassa
anya-e0103n7:209_11: samādhipadaṭṭhānaṁ sukhaṁ thirataraṁ hutvā pavattati, sukhena anubrūhitaṁ cittaṁ
anya-e0103n7:209_12: kammaṭṭhāne sammadeva samādhiyati. Evaṁ anukkamena pubbabhāge vitakkādayo uparūpari
anya-e0103n7:209_14: ekarasabhāvena paṭutamāni hutvā ekakkhaṇe jhānaṅgāni uppajjanti. Yaṁ sandhāya vuttaṁ bhagavatā –
anya-e0103n7:210: “Yasmiṁ, mahānāma, samaye ariyasāvako tathāgataṁ anussarati, nevassa tasmiṁ samaye rāgapariyuṭṭhitaṁ cittaṁ hoti…pe… sukhino cittaṁ samādhiyatī”ti.
anya-e0103n7:211_0: Kasmā panettha jhānaṁ appanāpattaṁ na hotīti āha “buddhaguṇānaṁ pana gambhīratāyā”tiādi.
anya-e0103n7:211_1: Gambhīre hi ārammaṇe gambhīre udake patitanāvā viya samathabhāvanā patiṭṭhaṁ na labhati,
anya-e0103n7:211_2: “gambhīratāyā”ti ca iminā sabhāvadhammatāpi saṅgahitā. Sabhāvadhammo hi gambhīro
anya-e0103n7:211_3: na paññatti. Nanu ca tajjāpaññattivasena sabhāvadhammo gayhatīti? Saccaṁ gayhati
anya-e0103n7:211_4: pubbabhāge, bhāvanāya pana vaḍḍhamānāya paññattiṁ samatikkamitvā sabhāveyeva cittaṁ
anya-e0103n7:211_5: tiṭṭhati. Nanu ca sabhāvadhammepi katthaci appanā samijjhati dutiyāruppajjhānādīti?
anya-e0103n7:211_6: Saccaṁ samijjhati, tañca kho ekappakāre ārammaṇe, idaṁ pana nānappakāranti dassento
anya-e0103n7:211_8: manasikāraṁ pavattentassa ekasmiṁyeva koṭṭhāse appanāvasena bhāvanā avatiṭṭhati,
anya-e0103n7:211_9: evamidha kasmā na hotīti? Visamoyaṁ upaññāso. Tattha hi satipi koṭṭhāsabahubhāve
anya-e0103n7:211_10: ekappakāreneva bhāvanā vattati paṭikkūlākārasseva gahaṇato, idha pana nānappakārena
anya-e0103n7:211_11: guṇānaṁ nānappakārattā, na ayamekasmiṁyeva guṇe ṭhātuṁ sakkoti bhāvanābalena paccakkhato
anya-e0103n7:211_12: buddhaguṇesu upaṭṭhahantesu saddhāya balavabhāvato. Teneva hi “adhimuttatāyā”ti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:211_13: Yadi upacārappattaṁ jhānaṁ hoti, kathaṁ buddhānussatīti vuttanti āha “tadeta”ntiādi.
anya-e0103n7:212_0: Sagāravo hoti sappatisso, satthu guṇasarīrassa paccakkhato upaṭṭhahanato. Tatoyeva
anya-e0103n7:212_2: bhāvanāya pavattattā sativepullaṁ. Tesaṁ paramagambhīratāya, nānappakāratāya ca paññāvepullaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:212_3: Tesaṁ uḷārapuññakkhettatāya puññavepullañca adhigacchati. Pītipāmojjabahulo hoti
anya-e0103n7:212_5: satiyā bhayabheravābhibhavanato. Tenāha bhagavā “anussaretha sambuddhaṁ, bhayaṁ tumhāka
anya-e0103n7:212_6: no siyā”ti. Dukkhādhivāsanasamattho buddhānussatiyā sarīradukkhassa padumapalāse
anya-e0103n7:212_7: udakassa viya vinivaṭṭanato. Saṁvāsasaññanti sahavāsasaññaṁ. Buddhabhūmiyaṁ cittaṁ
anya-e0103n7:212_8: namati buddhaguṇānaṁ mahantabhāvassa paccakkhato upaṭṭhānato. Buddhānussatibhāvanāya
anya-e0103n7:212_9: sabbadā buddhaguṇānaṁ citte viparivattanato vuttaṁ “sammukhā satthāraṁ passato viyā”ti.
anya-e0103n7:212_10: Uttari appaṭivijjhantoti imāya bhāvanāya upari taṁ adhiṭṭhānaṁ katvā saccāni appaṭivijjhanto.
anya-e0103n7:213_0: Appamādanti appamajjanaṁ sakkaccaṁ anuyogaṁ. Kayirāthāti kareyya. Sumedhasoti sundarapañño.
anya-e0103n7:213_1: Evaṁ mahānubhāvāyāti vuttappakārena nīvaraṇavikkhambhanādisamatthena satthari sagāravabhāvādihetubhūtena
anya-e0103n7:215_0: 146.Dhammānussatinti ettha padattho, sabhāvattho ca ādito vuttoyevāti taṁ anāmasitvā
anya-e0103n7:215_2: panettha buddhānussatiyaṁ viya “aveccappasādasamannāgatenā”ti na vuttaṁ. Nanu etā
anya-e0103n7:215_3: paṭipāṭiyā cha anussatiyo ariyasāvakānaṁ vasena desanaṁ āruḷhāti? Saccametaṁ, evaṁ
anya-e0103n7:215_5: idha na vuttaṁ, ariyasāvakānaṁ pana sukhena ijjhantīti. Tathāpi pāḷiyaṁ āgatattā
anya-e0103n7:215_6: ca buddhānussatiniddese vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṁ, ayañca vicāro parato āgamissateva.
anya-e0103n7:216_1: Lokuttaradhammovāti avadhāraṇaṁ nippariyāyena sandiṭṭhikādiatthaṁ sandhāya vuttaṁ,
anya-e0103n7:216_2: pariyāyato panete pariyattidhammepi sambhavanteva. Tathā hi pariyattidhammo bahussutena
anya-e0103n7:216_3: āgatāgamena paramena satinepakkena samannāgatena paññavatā ādikalyāṇatādivisesato
anya-e0103n7:216_4: sayaṁ daṭṭhabboti sandiṭṭhiko. Ācariyapayirupāsanāya vinā na labbhāti ce? Lokuttaradhammepi
anya-e0103n7:216_6: jayatī”ti ayaṁ panattho titthiyanimmaddane nippariyāyatova labbhati, kilesajaye pariyāyato
anya-e0103n7:216_7: paramparāhetubhāvato. “Sandiṭṭhaṁ arahatī”ti ayampi attho labbhateva, sabbaso saṁkilesadhammānaṁ
anya-e0103n7:216_8: pahānaṁ, vodānadhammānaṁ paribrūhanañca uddissa pavattattā. Ayañca attho “ye kho
anya-e0103n7:216_9: tvaṁ, gotami, dhamme jāneyyāsi, ime dhammā sarāgāya saṁvattanti no virāgāya, saññogāya
anya-e0103n7:216_10: saṁvattanti no visaññogāya, saupādānāya saṁvattanti no anupādānāya. Ekaṁsena, gotami,
anya-e0103n7:216_11: dhāreyyāsi ‘neso dhammo, neso vinayo, netaṁ satthusāsana”’nti, “dhammāpi vo, bhikkhave,
anya-e0103n7:216_12: pahātabbā, pageva adhammā”ti ca evamādīhi suttapadehi vibhāvetabbo. Akālikādhigamupāyatāya
anya-e0103n7:216_13: akāliko. Vijjamānatāparisuddhatāhi ehipassavidhiṁ arahatīti ehipassiko. Tato eva
anya-e0103n7:216_14: vaṭṭadukkhanittharaṇatthikehi attano citte upanayanaṁ, cittassa vā tattha upanayanaṁ
anya-e0103n7:216_15: arahatīti opaneyyiko. Vimuttāyatanasīse ṭhatvā paricayena sammadeva atthavedaṁ, dhammavedañca
anya-e0103n7:216_16: labhantehi paccattaṁ veditabbo viññūhīti. Evaṁ sandiṭṭhikādipadesu pariyattidhammampi
anya-e0103n7:217_0: Sāti gāthā. Samantabhadrakattāti sabbabhāgehi sundarattā. Dhammassāti sāsanadhammassa.
anya-e0103n7:217_1: Kiñcāpi avayavavinimutto samudāyo nāma paramatthato koci natthi, yesu pana avayavesu
anya-e0103n7:217_2: samudāyarūpena avekkhitesu “gāthā”ti samaññā, taṁ tato bhinnaṁ viya katvā saṁsāmivohāraṁ
anya-e0103n7:217_4: nātibahuvibhāgaṁ yathānusandhinā ekānusandhikaṁ sandhāya vuttaṁ, itarassa pana teneva
anya-e0103n7:217_6: nidānaganthena. Nigamanenāti “idamavocā”tiādikena, “iti yaṁ taṁ vuttaṁ, idametaṁ
anya-e0103n7:218_0: Ayaṁ kathā visesato suttapiṭakasaṁvaṇṇanāti katvā suttapiṭakavasena dhammassa ādikalyāṇādikaṁ
anya-e0103n7:218_1: dassetvā idāni suttapiṭakavinayapiṭakānaṁ vasena taṁ dassetuṁ “sanidānasauppattikattā”tiādi
anya-e0103n7:218_2: vuttaṁ. Tattha sanidānasauppattikattāti yathāvuttanidānena sanidānatāya, saaṭṭhuppattikatāya
anya-e0103n7:218_3: ca. Veneyyānaṁ anurūpatoti sikkhāpadapaññattiyā, dhammadesanāya ca taṁtaṁsikkhāpadabhāvena
anya-e0103n7:218_4: paññāpiyamānassa veneyyajjhāsayānurūpaṁ pavattiyamānassa anurūpato. Atthassāti desiyamānassa
anya-e0103n7:218_5: ca sīlādiatthassa. “Taṁ kissa hetu ? Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave”tiādinā tattha tattha
anya-e0103n7:219: Evaṁ suttavinayavasena pariyattidhammassa ādimajjhapariyosānakalyāṇataṁ dassetvā idāni tīṇi piṭakāni ekajjhaṁ gahetvā taṁ dassetuṁ “sakalopī”tiādi vuttaṁ. Tattha sāsanadhammoti –
anya-e0103n7:222_0: Evaṁ vuttassa satthusāsanassa pakāsako pariyattidhammo. Sīlena ādikalyāṇo sīlamūlakattā
anya-e0103n7:222_1: sāsanassa. Samathādīhi majjhekalyāṇo tesaṁ sāsanasampattiyā vemajjhabhāvato. Nibbānena
anya-e0103n7:222_2: pariyosānakalyāṇo tadadhigamato uttarikaraṇīyābhāvato. Sāsane sammāpaṭipatti nāma
anya-e0103n7:222_3: paññāya hoti, tassā ca sīlaṁ, samādhi ca mūlanti āha “sīlasamādhīhi ādikalyāṇo”ti.
anya-e0103n7:222_4: Paññā pana anubodhapaṭivedhavasena duvidhāti tadubhayampi gaṇhanto “vipassanāmaggehi
anya-e0103n7:222_5: majjhekalyāṇo”ti āha. Tassa nipphatti phalaṁ, kiccaṁ nibbānasacchikiriyā, tato paraṁ
anya-e0103n7:222_6: kattabbaṁ natthīti dassento āha “phalanibbānehi pariyosānakalyāṇo”ti. Phalaggahaṇena
anya-e0103n7:222_7: vā saupādisesanibbānamāha, itarena itaraṁ, tadubhayañca sāsanasampattiyā osānanti
anya-e0103n7:223_0: Buddhassa subodhitā sammāsambuddhatā, tāya ādikalyāṇo tappabhavattā. Sabbaso saṁkilesappahānaṁ
anya-e0103n7:223_1: vodānaṁ, pāripūrī ca dhammasudhammatā, tāya majjhekalyāṇo taṁsarīrattā. Satthārā
anya-e0103n7:223_2: yathānusiṭṭhaṁ tathā paṭipatti saṅghasuppaṭipatti, tāya pariyosānakalyāṇo, tāya sāsanassa
anya-e0103n7:223_3: loke suppatiṭṭhitabhāvato. Tanti sāsanadhammaṁ. Tathattāyāti yathattāya bhagavatā
anya-e0103n7:223_4: dhammo desito, tathattāya tathabhāvāya. So pana abhisambodhi paccekabodhi sāvakabodhīti
anya-e0103n7:223_5: tividho, ito aññathā nibbānādhigamassa abhāvato. Tattha sabbaguṇehi aggabhāvato,
anya-e0103n7:223_6: itarabodhidvayamūlatāya ca paṭhamāya bodhiyā ādikalyāṇatā, guṇehi vemajjhabhāvato
anya-e0103n7:223_7: dutiyāya majjhekalyāṇatā, tadubhayāvaratāya, tadosānatāya ca sāsanadhammassa tatiyāya
anya-e0103n7:224: Esoti sāsanadhammo. Nīvaraṇavikkhambhanatoti vimuttāyatanasīse ṭhatvā saddhammaṁ suṇantassa nīvaraṇānaṁ vikkhambhanasambhavato. Vuttaṁ hetaṁ –
anya-e0103n7:225: “Yathā yathāvuso, bhikkhuno satthā vā dhammaṁ deseti, aññataro vā garuṭṭhāniyo sabrahmacārī, tathā tathā so tattha labhati atthavedaṁ labhati dhammaveda”nti.
anya-e0103n7:226: “Yasmiṁ, bhikkhave, samaye ariyasāvako ohitasoto dhammaṁ suṇāti, pañcassa nīvaraṇāni tasmiṁ samaye pahīnāni hontī”ti –
anya-e0103n7:227: Ca ādi. Samathavipassanāsukhāvahanatoti samathasukhassa ca vipassanāsukhassa ca sampādanato. Vuttampi cetaṁ –
anya-e0103n7:228: “So vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkaṁ savicāraṁ vivekajaṁ pītisukha”ntiādi.
anya-e0103n7:232: Amānusī ratī hoti, sammā dhammaṁ vipassato”ti ca. ;
anya-e0103n7:233_0: Tathāpaṭipannoti yathā samathavipassanāsukhaṁ āvahati, yathā vā satthārā anusiṭṭhaṁ,
anya-e0103n7:233_1: tathā paṭipanno sāsanadhammo. Tādibhāvāvahanatoti chaḷaṅgupekkhāvasena iṭṭhādīsu
anya-e0103n7:233_2: tādibhāvassa lokadhammehi anupalepassa āvahanato. Esa bhagavā vuttanayena tividhakalyāṇaṁ
anya-e0103n7:233_3: dhammaṁ desento yaṁ sāsanabrahmacariyaṁ, maggabrahmacariyañca pakāseti, taṁ yathānurūpaṁ
anya-e0103n7:234_0: Tattha avisesena tisso sikkhā, sakalo ca tantidhammo sāsanabrahmacariyaṁ. Yaṁ sandhāya
anya-e0103n7:234_1: vuttaṁ “katamesānaṁ kho, bhante, buddhānaṁ bhagavantānaṁ brahmacariyaṁ naciraṭṭhitikaṁ
anya-e0103n7:234_3: Yaṁ sandhāya vuttaṁ “khīṇā jāti, vusitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ, kataṁ karaṇīya”nti. Yathānurūpanti
anya-e0103n7:234_4: yathārahaṁ. Sikkhattayasaṅgahaṁ hi sāsanabrahmacariyaṁ atthasampattiyā sātthaṁ. Maggabrahmacariye
anya-e0103n7:234_5: vattabbameva natthi. Atthasampattiyāti sampannatthatāya. Sampattiattho hi idha saha-saddo.
anya-e0103n7:234_6: Itaraṁ pana yathāvuttenatthena sātthaṁ, sabyañjanañca. Ye panettha “vacanasabhāvaṁ
anya-e0103n7:234_7: sātthaṁ, atthasabhāvaṁ sabyañjana”nti vibhajitvā vadanti, taṁ na sundaraṁ, tathā
anya-e0103n7:234_8: vibhattassa pariyattidhammassa abhāvato. Saddatthā hi abhinnarūpā viya hutvā viniyogaṁ
anya-e0103n7:234_9: gacchanti. Tathā hi nesaṁ lokiyāmissībhāvaṁ paṭijānanti. Satipi vā bhede “sabyañjana”nti
anya-e0103n7:234_10: ettha yadi tulyayogo adhippeto “saputto āgato”tiādīsu viya, evaṁ sati “atthapaṭisaraṇā,
anya-e0103n7:234_11: bhikkhave, hotha, mā byañjanapaṭisaraṇā”ti atthappadhānavādo bādhito siyā, atha vijjamānatāmattaṁ
anya-e0103n7:234_12: “salomako sapakkhako”tiādīsu viya byañjanasampatti aggahitā siyā. Tasmā aṭṭhakathāyaṁ
anya-e0103n7:235_0: Sātthaṁ sabyañjananti ettha nettinayenāpi atthaṁ dassetuṁ “saṅkāsana…pe… sabyañjana”nti
anya-e0103n7:235_1: vuttaṁ. Tattha yadipi nettiyaṁ byañjanamukhena byañjanatthaggahaṇaṁ hotīti “akkharaṁ
anya-e0103n7:235_2: pada”ntiādinā byañjanapadāni paṭhamaṁ uddiṭṭhāni, idha pana pāḷiyaṁ “sātthaṁ sabyañjana”nti
anya-e0103n7:235_3: āgatattā atthapadāniyeva paṭhamaṁ dassetuṁ “saṅkāsanapakāsanā”tiādi vuttaṁ. Tattha
anya-e0103n7:235_4: saṅkhepato kāsanaṁ dīpanaṁ saṅkāsanaṁ “maññamāno bhikkhu baddho mārassa, amaññamāno
anya-e0103n7:235_5: mutto”tiādīsu viya. Tattakena hi tena bhikkhunā paṭividdhaṁ. Tenāha “aññātaṁ bhagavā”tiādi.
anya-e0103n7:235_6: Paṭhamaṁ kāsanaṁ pakāsanaṁ. Ādikammasmiṁ hi ayaṁ pasaddo “paññapeti paṭṭhapetī”tiādīsu
anya-e0103n7:235_7: viya. Tikkhindriyāpekkhaṁ cetaṁ padadvayaṁ uddesabhāvato. Tikkhindriyo hi saṅkhepato
anya-e0103n7:235_8: paṭhamañca vuttamatthaṁ paṭipajjati. Saṁkhittassa vitthāravacanaṁ, sakiṁ vuttassa
anya-e0103n7:235_9: puna vacanañca vivaraṇavibhajanāni. Yathā “kusalā dhammā”ti saṅkhepato sakiṁyeva
anya-e0103n7:235_10: ca vuttassa atthassa “katame dhammā kusalā? Yasmiṁ samaye kāmāvacaraṁ kusalaṁ citta”ntiādinā
anya-e0103n7:235_11: vitthārato vivaraṇavasena, vibhajanavasena ca puna vacanaṁ. Majjhimindriyāpekkhametaṁ
anya-e0103n7:235_12: padadvayaṁ niddesabhāvato. Vivaṭassa vitthāratarābhidhānaṁ, vibhattassa ca pakārehi
anya-e0103n7:235_13: ñāpanaṁ veneyyānaṁ cittaparitosanaṁ uttānīkaraṇapaññāpanāni. Yathā “phasso hotī”tiādinā
anya-e0103n7:235_14: vivaṭavibhattassa atthassa “katamo tasmiṁ samaye phasso? Yo tasmiṁ samaye phasso
anya-e0103n7:235_15: phusanā samphusanā”tiādinā uttānīkiriyā, paññāpanā ca. Mudindriyāpekkhametaṁ padadvayaṁ
anya-e0103n7:236: Kathaṁ panāyaṁ pāṭhavikappo jātoti? Vuccate – nettipāḷiyaṁ āgatanayena purimapāṭho. Tattha hi –
anya-e0103n7:241_0: Desanāhārayojanāya ca etassevatthassa “saṅkāsanā pakāsanā”tiādinā āgataṁ. Pacchimo
anya-e0103n7:241_1: pana “paññapeti paṭṭhapeti vivarati vibhajati uttānīkaroti ‘passathā’ti cāhā”ti sutte
anya-e0103n7:241_2: āgatanayena byañjanamattakato. Evañca nesaṁ dvinnaṁ pāṭhānaṁ viseso, na atthato.
anya-e0103n7:241_3: Tathā hi saṅkhepato “paṭhamaṁ ñāpanaṁ paññāpanaṁ, paṭhamameva ṭhapanaṁ paṭṭhapana”nti
anya-e0103n7:241_4: imāni padāni saṅkāsanapakāsanapadehi atthato avisiṭṭhāni. Yañca purimapāṭhe chaṭṭhaṁ
anya-e0103n7:241_5: padaṁ “pakārato ñāpana”nti paññāpanaṁ vuttaṁ, taṁ dutiyapāṭhe pakāsanapadena “nibbisesaṁ
anya-e0103n7:241_6: pakārato kāsana”nti katvā. Yasmā ñāpanakāsanāni atthāvabhāsanasabhāvatāya abhinnāni,
anya-e0103n7:241_7: sabbesañca veneyyānaṁ cittassa tosanaṁ, buddhiyā ca nisānaṁ yāthāvato vatthusabhāvāvabhāsane
anya-e0103n7:241_8: jāyatīti. Evaṁ atthapadarūpattā pariyattiatthassa yathāvuttachaatthapadasamāyogato sātthaṁ sāsanaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:242_1: pade vaṇṇo akkharaṁ. “Ekakkharaṁ padaṁ akkhara”nti eke “ā evaṁ kira ta”ntiādīsu ā-kārādayo
anya-e0103n7:242_2: viya. “Visuddhakaraṇānaṁ manasā desanāvācāya akkharaṇato akkhara”nti aññe. Vibhattiyantaṁ
anya-e0103n7:242_3: atthañāpanato padaṁ. Saṅkhepato vuttaṁ padābhihitaṁ atthaṁ byañjetīti byañjanaṁ,
anya-e0103n7:242_4: vākyaṁ. “Kiriyāpadaṁ abyayakārakavisesanayuttaṁ vākya”nti hi vadanti. Pakārato vākyavibhāgo
anya-e0103n7:242_5: ākāro. Ākārābhihitaṁ nibbacanaṁ nirutti. Nibbacanavitthāro nissesupadesato niddeso.
anya-e0103n7:242_6: Etesaṁ akkharādīnaṁ byañjanapadānaṁ sampattiyā sampannatāya sabyañjanaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:243_0: Tatrāyamassa atthapadasamāyogo, byañjanasampatti ca – akkharehi saṅkāseti, padehi
anya-e0103n7:243_1: pakāseti, byañjanehi vivarati, ākārehi vibhajati, niruttīhi uttānīkaroti, niddesehi
anya-e0103n7:243_2: paññapeti, tathā akkharehi ugghāṭetvā padehi vineti ugghaṭitaññuṁ, byañjanehi vipañcetvā
anya-e0103n7:243_3: ākārehi vineti vipañcitaññuṁ, niruttīhi netvā niddesehi vineti neyyaṁ. Evañcāyaṁ
anya-e0103n7:243_4: dhammo ugghaṭiyamāno ugghaṭitaññuṁ vineti, vipañciyamāno vipañcitaññuṁ, niyyamāno
anya-e0103n7:243_5: neyyaṁ. Tattha ugghaṭanā ādi, vipañcanā majjhe, nayanamante. Evaṁ tīsu kālesu tidhā
anya-e0103n7:243_6: desito dosattayavidhamano guṇattayāvaho tividhaveneyyavinayanoti. Evampi tividhakalyāṇoyaṁ
anya-e0103n7:243_7: dhammo atthabyañjanapāripūriyā “sāttho sabyañjano”ti veditabbo “paripuṇṇo, parisuddho”ti ca.
anya-e0103n7:244_0: Atthagambhīratātiādīsu attho nāma tantiattho. Dhammo tanti. Paṭivedho tantiyā, tantiatthassa
anya-e0103n7:244_1: ca yathābhūtāvabodho. Desanā manasā vavatthāpitāya tantiyā desanā. Te panete atthādayo
anya-e0103n7:244_2: yasmā sasādīhi viya mahāsamuddo mandabuddhīhi dukkhogāhā, alabbhaneyyapatiṭṭhā ca,
anya-e0103n7:244_3: tasmā gambhīrā. Atha vā attho nāma hetuphalaṁ. Dhammo hetu. Desanā paññatti, yathādhammaṁ
anya-e0103n7:244_4: dhammābhilāpo, anulomapaṭilomasaṅkhepavitthārādivasena vā kathanaṁ. Paṭivedho abhisamayo,
anya-e0103n7:244_5: atthānurūpaṁ dhammesu, dhammānurūpaṁ atthesu, paññattipathānurūpaṁ paññattīsu avabodho,
anya-e0103n7:244_6: tesaṁ tesaṁ vā dhammānaṁ paṭivijjhitabbo salakkhaṇasaṅkhāto aviparītasabhāvo. Tepi
anya-e0103n7:244_7: cete atthādayo yasmā anupacitakusalasambhārehi duppaññehi sasādīhi viya mahāsamuddo
anya-e0103n7:244_8: dukkhogāhā, alabbhaneyyapatiṭṭhā ca, tasmā gambhīrā. Tesu paṭivedhassāpi atthasannissitattā
anya-e0103n7:245_0: Atthesu pabhedagataṁ ñāṇaṁ atthapaṭisambhidā. Atthadhammaniruttipaṭisambhidāsu pabhedagataṁ
anya-e0103n7:245_1: ñāṇaṁ paṭibhānapaṭisambhidāti imissāpi paṭisambhidāya atthavisayattā āha “atthapaṭibhānapaṭisambhidāvisayato
anya-e0103n7:245_2: sāttha”nti, atthasampattiyā asati tadabhāvato. Dhammoti tanti. Niruttīti tantipadānaṁ
anya-e0103n7:245_3: niddhāretvā vacanaṁ. Tattha pabhedagatāni ñāṇāni dhammaniruttipaṭisambhidāti āha
anya-e0103n7:245_5: Parikkhakajanappasādakanti ettha iti-saddo hetuattho. Yasmā parikkhakajanānaṁ kiṁkusalagavesīnaṁ
anya-e0103n7:245_6: pasādāvahaṁ, tasmā sātthaṁ. Atthasampannanti phalena hetuno anumānaṁ nadīpūrena viya
anya-e0103n7:245_7: upari vuṭṭhippavattiyā. Sātthakatā panassa paṇḍitavedanīyatāya, sā paramagambhīrasaṇhasukhumabhāvato
anya-e0103n7:245_9: yasmā lokiyajanassa pasādāvahaṁ, tasmā sabyañjanaṁ. Lokiyajano hi byañjanasampattiyā
anya-e0103n7:245_10: tussati, idhāpi phalena hetuno anumānaṁ. Sabyañjanatā panassa saddheyyatāya, sā ādikalyāṇādibhāvato veditabbā.
anya-e0103n7:246_0: Atha vā paṇḍitavedanīyato sāttha”nti paññāpadaṭṭhānatāya atthasampannataṁ āha, tato
anya-e0103n7:246_2: tato lokiyajanappasādakanti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo. Gambhīrādhippāyato sātthanti
anya-e0103n7:246_3: adhippāyato agādhāpāratāya atthasampannaṁ aññathā tadabhāvato. Uttānapadato sabyañjananti
anya-e0103n7:246_4: subodhasaddatāya byañjanasampannaṁ, paramagambhīrassapi atthassa veneyyānaṁ suviññeyyabhāvāpādanato.
anya-e0103n7:246_5: Sabbopesa paṭhamassa atthadvayassa pabhedo daṭṭhabbo, tathā ceva tattha tattha saṁvaṇṇitaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:246_6: Tathā hettha vikappassa, samuccayassa vā aggahaṇaṁ. Upanetabbassāti pakkhipitabbassa
anya-e0103n7:246_7: vodānatthassa avuttassa abhāvato. Sakalaparipuṇṇabhāvenāti sabbabhāgehi paripuṇṇatāya.
anya-e0103n7:247_1: adhigamaveyyattiyasabbhāvato sātthaṁ kapilavatādi viya tucchaṁ niratthakaṁ ahutvā
anya-e0103n7:247_3: durakkhātadhammesu paricayaṁ karontassa viya sammohaṁ ajanetvā bāhusaccaveyyattiyasabbhāvato
anya-e0103n7:247_4: sabyañcanaṁ. Byañjanasampattiyā hi sati āgamabyattīti. Sīlādipañcadhammakkhandhayuttatoti
anya-e0103n7:247_5: sīlādīhi pañcahi dhammakoṭṭhāsehi avirahitattā. Kevalaparipuṇṇaṁ anavasesena samantato
anya-e0103n7:247_7: vaṭṭadukkhato nissaraṇāya. Lokāmisanirapekkhatoti kathañcipi taṇhāsannissayassa anissayanato.
anya-e0103n7:248_0: Evaṁ ādikalyāṇatādiapadesena satthu purimavesārajjadvayavasena dhammassa svākkhātataṁ
anya-e0103n7:248_2: vā suṭṭhu akkhātoti svākkhāto”ti vatvā tamatthaṁ byatirekamukhena vibhāvento “yathā
anya-e0103n7:248_3: hī”tiādimāha. Tattha vipallāsamāpajjatīti tesaṁ dhamme “antarāyikā”ti vuttadhammānaṁ
anya-e0103n7:248_4: vipākādīnaṁ antarāyikattābhāvato ekaṁsena apāyūpapattihetutāya abhāvato. Niyyānikattābhāvatoti
anya-e0103n7:248_6: tato niyyānikattābhāvato viparīto eva hoti. Tenāti atthassa vipallāsāpajjanena. Te
anya-e0103n7:249_3: anāmasanīyā yādisī paṭipadā, tadanurūpassa. Supaññattāti sīlādikkhandhattayasaṅgahitā
anya-e0103n7:249_4: sammādiṭṭhiādippabhedā micchādiṭṭhiādīnaṁ pahāyikabhāvena suṭṭhu sammadeva vihitā.
anya-e0103n7:249_5: Saṁsandati kilesamalavisuddhitāya sameti. Evaṁ magganibbānānaṁ paṭipadāpaṭipajjanīyabhāvehi
anya-e0103n7:249_6: aññamaññānurūpatāya svākkhātataṁ dassetvā idāni tividhassāpi lokuttaradhammassa paccekaṁ
anya-e0103n7:249_7: svākkhātataṁ dassetuṁ “ariyamaggo cetthā”tiādi vuttaṁ. Tattha antadvayanti sassatucchedaṁ,
anya-e0103n7:249_8: kāmasukhaattakilamathānuyogaṁ, līnuddhaccaṁ, patiṭṭhānāyūhananti evaṁ pabhedaṁ antadvayaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:249_9: Anupagammāti anupagantvā, anupagamanahetu vā. Paṭipassaddhakilesānīti suṭṭhu vūpasantakilesāni,
anya-e0103n7:249_11: vo, bhikkhave, dhammaṁ desessāmi amatañca tāṇañca leṇañcā”tiādinā tesu tesu suttesu
anya-e0103n7:250_0: 148.“Rāgādīnaṁ abhāvaṁ karontena ariyapuggalena sāmaṁ daṭṭhabbo”ti iminā “ariyamaggena
anya-e0103n7:250_1: mama rāgādayo pahīnā”ti sayaṁ attanā anaññaneyyena daṭṭhabboti sandiṭṭhi, sandiṭṭhi eva sandiṭṭhiko.
anya-e0103n7:251_0: Tenatena ariyasāvakena parasaddhāya parassa saddahanena paraneyyena gantabbataṁ hitvā
anya-e0103n7:251_1: ñāpetabbataṁ pahāya paccavekkhaṇañāṇena karaṇabhūtena. Pasatthā diṭṭhi sandiṭṭhi
anya-e0103n7:251_2: yathā sambojjhaṅgo. Ariyamaggo attanā sampayuttāya sandiṭṭhiyā kilese jayati, ariyaphalaṁ
anya-e0103n7:251_3: tāya eva attano kāraṇabhūtāya, nibbānaṁ ārammaṇakaraṇena attano visayībhūtāya sandiṭṭhiyā
anya-e0103n7:252_1: heṭṭhimaṁ sakadāgāmivipassanādīnaṁ paccayabhāvena upari maggādhigamassa upanissayabhāvato
anya-e0103n7:253_0: 149.Nāssakāloti nāssa āgametabbo kālo atthi. Yathā hi lokiyakusalassa “upapajje,
anya-e0103n7:253_1: aparapariyāye”tiādinā phaladānaṁ pati āgametabbo kālo atthi, na evametassāti attho.
anya-e0103n7:253_2: Tenāha “na pañcāhā”tiādi. Pakaṭṭhoti dūro. Phaladānaṁ pati kālo pakaṭṭho assāti kāliko,
anya-e0103n7:253_3: kālantaraphaladāyī. Tenāha “attano phaladāne”ti. Pattoti upanīto. Idanti “akāliko”ti padaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:254_1: upalabbhamānattā. Parisuddhattāti kilesamalavirahena sabbathā visuddhattā. Amanuññampi
anya-e0103n7:254_2: kadāci payojanavasena yathāsabhāvappakāsanena dassetabbaṁ bhaveyyāti tadabhāvaṁ dassento
anya-e0103n7:255_0: 151. Upanetabboti upaneyyo, upaneyyova opaneyyikoti imassa atthassa adhippetattā
anya-e0103n7:255_1: āha “upanetabboti opaneyyiko”ti. Citte upanayanaṁ uppādananti āha “idaṁ saṅkhate
anya-e0103n7:255_2: lokuttaradhamme yujjatī”ti. Citte upanayananti pana ārammaṇabhūtassa dhammassa ārammaṇabhāvūpanayane
anya-e0103n7:255_3: adhippete asaṅkhatepi yujjeyya “ārammaṇakaraṇasaṅkhātaṁ upanayanaṁ arahatīti opaneyyiko”ti.
anya-e0103n7:255_4: Allīyananti phusanaṁ. Nibbānaṁ upaneti ariyapuggalanti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n7:256_0: 152.Viññūhīti vidūhi, paṭividdhasaccehīti attho. Te pana ekaṁsato ugghaṭitaññūādayo
anya-e0103n7:256_2: attho gahetabboti āha “attani attanī”ti. Veditabboti vuttaṁ, kathaṁ veditabboti āha
anya-e0103n7:256_3: “bhāvito me”tiādi. Tattha “me”ti iminā “paccatta”nti padena vuttamatthaṁ anvayato
anya-e0103n7:256_4: dassetvā puna byatirekena dassetuṁ “na hī”tiādi vuttaṁ, taṁ suviññeyyameva. “Viññūhī”ti
anya-e0103n7:256_5: idaṁ antogadhāvadhāraṇanti dassento “bālānaṁ pana avisayo cesā”ti āha.
anya-e0103n7:257_0: Evaṁ ādikalyāṇatādinā aññamaññassa anurūpadesanāya dhammassa svākkhātataṁ dassetvā
anya-e0103n7:257_1: idāni purimassa purimassa pacchimaṁ pacchimaṁ padaṁ kāraṇavacananti dassento “apicā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0103n7:257_2: Tattha sandiṭṭhikattāti yasmā ayaṁ dhammo vuttanayena sāmaṁ daṭṭhabbo, sandiṭṭhiyā
anya-e0103n7:257_3: kilese viddhaṁseti, sandassanañca arahati, tasmā svākkhāto durakkhāte titthiyadhamme
anya-e0103n7:257_4: tadabhāvato. Iminā nayena sesapadesupi yathārahaṁ attho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0103n7:258: 153.Tassevantiādīsu yaṁ vattabbaṁ, taṁ buddhānussatiyaṁ vuttanayena veditabbaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:260_0: 154.Ariyasaṅghaguṇāti ārakattā kilesehi, anaye na iriyanato, aye ca iriyanato, sadevakena
anya-e0103n7:260_1: ca lokena “saraṇa”nti araṇīyato ariyo ca so saṅgho ca, ariyānaṁ vā saṅgho ariyasaṅgho, tassa guṇā.
anya-e0103n7:261_0: 155. Yaṁ sammāpaṭipadaṁ paṭipanno “suṭṭhu paṭipanno”ti vuccati. Sā ariyamaggapaṭipadā
anya-e0103n7:261_1: paṭipakkhadhamme anivattidhamme katvā pajahanato payojanābhāvā sayampi anivattidhammā,
anya-e0103n7:261_2: adhigantabbassa ca nibbānassa ekaṁsato anulomīti. Tato eva apaccanīkā, anudhammabhūtā
anya-e0103n7:261_3: ca, tassā ca paṭipannattā ariyasaṅgho “suppaṭipanno”ti vuttoti dassetuṁ “suṭṭhu paṭipanno”tiādi
anya-e0103n7:261_4: vuttaṁ. Tattha “anivattipaṭipada”nti iminā ujuppaṭipattiṁ dasseti. Punappunaṁ nivattane
anya-e0103n7:261_5: hi sati ujuppaṭipatti na hoti. “Anulomapaṭipadaṁ apaccanīkapaṭipada”nti iminā ñāyappaṭipattiṁ.
anya-e0103n7:261_6: Paṭipajjitabbassa hi nibbānassa anulomanena, apaccanīkatāya cassā ñāyato. “Dhammānudhammapaṭipada”nti
anya-e0103n7:261_7: iminā sāmīcippaṭipattiṁ anucchavikabhāvadīpanato. Etena paṭhamapadassa papañcaniddeso,
anya-e0103n7:261_8: itarāni tīṇi padānīti dasseti. Tenāha “yasmā panā”tiādi.
anya-e0103n7:262_0: Yathānusiṭṭhaṁ paṭipajjanena kiccasiddhito ariyabhāvāvahaṁ savanaṁ sakkaccasavanaṁ
anya-e0103n7:262_1: nāmāti vuttaṁ “sakkaccaṁ suṇantīti sāvakā”ti, tena ariyā eva nippariyāyato satthu
anya-e0103n7:262_2: sāvakā nāmāti dasseti. Sīladiṭṭhisāmaññatāyāti ariyena sīlena, ariyāya ca diṭṭhiyā
anya-e0103n7:262_3: samānabhāvena. Ariyānañhi sīladiṭṭhiyo majjhe bhinnasuvaṇṇaṁ viya ninnānākaraṇaṁ
anya-e0103n7:262_4: maggenāgatattā. Tena te yattha katthaci ṭhitāpi saṁhatāva. Tenāha “saṅghātabhāvamāpanno”ti.
anya-e0103n7:262_5: Māyāsāṭheyyādipāpadhammasamucchedena uju. Tato eva gomuttavaṅkābhāvena avaṅkā. Candalekhāvaṅkābhāvena
anya-e0103n7:262_6: akuṭilā. Naṅgalakoṭivaṅkābhāvena ajimhā. Avaṅkādibhāvena vā uju. Parisuddhaṭṭhena
anya-e0103n7:262_7: ariyā. Apaṇṇakabhāvena ñāyati kamati nibbānaṁ, taṁ vā ñāyati paṭivijjhīyati etenāti
anya-e0103n7:262_8: ñāyo. Vaṭṭadukkhaniyyānāya anucchavikattā. Anurūpattā sāmīci opāyikātipi saṅkhaṁ
anya-e0103n7:262_9: samaññaṁ gatā sammāpaṭipatti, tāya samaṅgitāya suppaṭipannā “sammā paṭipajjantī”ti
anya-e0103n7:262_10: katvā. Vattamānattho hi ayaṁ paṭipanna-saddo yathā “sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya
anya-e0103n7:262_11: paṭipanno”ti. Atītaṁ paṭipadanti yathāvuttamaggasammāpaṭipattiṁ vadati. Ubhayena
anya-e0103n7:262_12: ca sāmaññaniddesena, “suppaṭipannā ca suppaṭipannā ca suppaṭipannā”ti ekasesanayena
anya-e0103n7:263_0: Evaṁ ādipadatthaniddesabhāvena itarapadānaṁ atthaṁ vatvā idāni catunnampi padānaṁ
anya-e0103n7:263_1: avomissakaṁ atthaṁ dassetuṁ “apicā”tiādi vuttaṁ. Tattha yathānusiṭṭhanti satthārā
anya-e0103n7:263_2: yathā anusiṭṭhaṁ, tathā anusāsanīanurūpanti attho. Apaṇṇakapaṭipadanti avirajjhanakapaṭipadaṁ,
anya-e0103n7:263_3: anavajjapaṭipattinti attho. Ettha ca svākkhāte dhammavinaye apaṇṇakapaṭipadaṁ paṭipannattāti
anya-e0103n7:263_4: evaṁ sambandhitabbaṁ. Purimapadena sambandhe dutiyapadaṁ na vattabbaṁ siyā, nanu
anya-e0103n7:263_5: ca dutiyapadena sambandhepi paṭhamaṁ padaṁ na vattabbaṁ siyāti? Na tassa paṭhamaṁ
anya-e0103n7:263_6: apekkhitattā. Sā pana sāvakānaṁ apaṇṇakapaṭipadā yathānusiṭṭhaṁ paṭipadāti dassanatthaṁ
anya-e0103n7:263_8: ubhayaṁ vuttaṁ. Tathā hi pi-saddena ubhayaṁ samuccinoti.
anya-e0103n7:264: Kilesajimhavasena antadvayagāhoti sabbaso taṁ pahāya sammāpaṭipadā kāyādivaṅkappahāyinī ujuppaṭipatti hotīti āha “majjhimāya paṭipadāya…pe… ujuppaṭipanno”ti.
anya-e0103n7:265_0: Ñāyo nāma yuttappattapaṭipatti, nibbānañca, sabbasaṅkhārasamathatāya ādittaṁ celaṁ,
anya-e0103n7:265_1: sīsaṁ vā ajjhupekkhitvāpi paṭipajjitabbamevāti āha “ñāyo vuccati nibbāna”nti. Nibbāyanakiriyāmukhena
anya-e0103n7:265_2: cettha nibbānaṁ vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṁ, maggañāṇādīhi vā ñāyati paṭivijjhīyati sacchikarīyati
anya-e0103n7:265_3: cāti ñāyo nibbānanti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0103n7:266: Guṇasambhāvanāya parehi kayiramānaṁ paccupaṭṭhānādisāmīcikammaṁ arahantīti sāmīcikammārahā.
anya-e0103n7:267_1: imānī”ti. Evanti pakāratthe nipāto, iminā pakārenāti attho. Tena itarāni tīṇi yugaḷāni
anya-e0103n7:267_2: dassitāni hontīti āha “evaṁ cattāri purisayugaḷāni hontī”ti. Etanti etaṁ “purisapuggalā”ti
anya-e0103n7:267_3: bahuvacanavasena vuttaṁ padaṁ. Purisā ca te puggalā ca purisapuggalā. Tattha “purisā”ti
anya-e0103n7:267_4: iminā paṭhamāya pakatiyā gahaṇaṁ, “puggalā”ti pana dutiyāyapi sattasāmaññenāti evaṁ
anya-e0103n7:267_5: vā ettha attho daṭṭhabbo. Catunnaṁ paccayānaṁ kīdisānaṁ? Ānetvā hunitabbānanti adhikārato
anya-e0103n7:267_6: pākaṭoyamattho. Dātabbanti vā paccattavacanaṁ “catunnaṁ paccayāna”nti padaṁ apekkhitvā
anya-e0103n7:267_7: sāmivasena pariṇāmetabbaṁ, aññathā yesaṁ kesañci catunnaṁ paccayānaṁ “āhuna”nti samaññā
anya-e0103n7:267_8: siyā. Āhunaṁ arahatīti vā āhuneyyo. Sakkādīnampi vā āhavananti sakkādīhipi diyyamānaṁ
anya-e0103n7:267_9: dānaṁ. Yattha hutaṁ mahapphalanti yasmiṁ āvahanīyaggimhi hutaṁ dadhiādi āhuneyyaggigahapataggidakkhiṇeyyaggīsu
anya-e0103n7:267_10: hutato uḷāraphalanti tesaṁ brāhmaṇānaṁ laddhi. Hutanti dinnaṁ. Nikāyantareti sabbatthikavādinikāye.
anya-e0103n7:268_0: Ṭhapetvā 165 teti te piyamanāpe ñātimitte apanetvā, tesaṁ adatvāti adhippāyo. Esa
anya-e0103n7:268_1: eso. Ekabuddhantare ca dissatīti ekasmiṁ buddhantare vītivatte dissati. Ca-saddena
anya-e0103n7:268_2: kadāci asaṅkhyeyyepi kappe vītivatteti dasseti. Abbokiṇṇanti paṭipakkhehi avomissaṁ,
anya-e0103n7:268_3: kiriyāvisesakañcetaṁ. Piyamanāpattakaradhammā nāma sīlādayo, te ariyasaṅghe suppatiṭṭhitā.
anya-e0103n7:268_4: Ayaṁ hettha adhippāyo – ñātimittā vippayuttā na cirasseva samāgacchanti, anavaṭṭhitā
anya-e0103n7:268_5: ca tesu piyamanāpatā, na evamariyasaṅgho. Tasmā saṅghova pāhuneyyoti. Pubbakāranti
anya-e0103n7:268_7: ca sabbena pakārena. Svāyaṁ pāhavanīya-saddo “pāhuneyyo”ti vuccati pariyāyabhāvena.
anya-e0103n7:269_0: Dakkhanti etāya sattā yathādhippetāhi sampattīhi vaḍḍhantīti dakkhiṇā. Tathābhāvakaraṇena
anya-e0103n7:269_1: dakkhiṇaṁ arahati. Yathā uḷārātivipuludrayalābhena visodhitaṁ nāma hoti, evaṁ dakkhiṇā
anya-e0103n7:271_0: Yadipi pāḷiyaṁ “anuttara”nti vuttaṁ. Natthi ito uttaraṁ visiṭṭhanti hi anuttaraṁ.
anya-e0103n7:271_1: Samampissa pana natthīti dassento “asadisa”nti āha. Khittaṁ vuttaṁ bījaṁ mahapphalabhāvakaraṇena
anya-e0103n7:271_2: tāyati rakkhati, khipanti vapanti ettha bījānīti vā khettaṁ, kedārādi, khettaṁ viya
anya-e0103n7:271_3: khettaṁ, puññānaṁ khettaṁ puññakkhettaṁ. Sesaṁ buddhānussatiyaṁ vuttanayānusārena veditabbaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:273_0: 158. Aho vata sīlāni akhaṇḍāni, aho vata acchiddānīti evaṁ sabbattha yojetabbaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:273_1: Aho vatāti ca sambhāvane nipāto. Tenāha “akhaṇḍatādiguṇavasenā”ti. Akhaṇḍabhāvādisampattivasenāti
anya-e0103n7:273_2: attho. Parassa sīlāni anussariyamānāni piyamanāpabhāvāvahanena kevalaṁ mettāya padaṭṭhānaṁ
anya-e0103n7:273_3: honti, na visuṁ kammaṭṭhānanti āha “attano sīlāni anussaritabbānī”ti. Cāgādīsupi eseva nayo.
anya-e0103n7:274_0: Yesanti sīlādīnaṁ. Paṭipāṭiyā samādāne samādānakkamena, ekajjhaṁ samādāne uddesakkamena
anya-e0103n7:274_1: sīlānaṁ ādiantaṁ veditabbaṁ. Pariyante chinnasāṭako viyāti vatthante, dasante vā
anya-e0103n7:274_2: chinnavatthaṁ viya, visadisūdāharaṇaṁ cetaṁ. Evaṁ sesānipi udāharaṇāni. Vinivedhavasena
anya-e0103n7:274_3: chinnasāṭako vinividdhasāṭako. Visabhāgavaṇṇena gāvī viyāti sambandho. Sabalarahitāni
anya-e0103n7:274_4: vā asabalāni. Tathā akammāsāni. Sattavidhamethunasaṁyogo heṭṭhā sīlakathāyaṁ vutto
anya-e0103n7:274_6: gahitā. Tāniyeva akhaṇḍādiguṇāni sīlāni. Sīlassa taṇhādāsabyato mocanaṁ vivaṭṭūpanissayabhāvāpādanaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:274_7: Tato eva taṁsamaṅgīpuggalo serī sayaṁvasī bhujisso nāma hoti. Tenāha “bhujissabhāvakaraṇena
anya-e0103n7:274_8: bhujissānī”ti. “Imināhaṁ sīlena devo vā bhaveyyaṁ devaññataro vā, tattha nicco dhuvo
anya-e0103n7:274_9: sassato”ti, “sīlena suddhī”ti ca evamādinā taṇhādiṭṭhīhi aparāmaṭṭhattā ayaṁ te sīlesu
anya-e0103n7:274_10: dosoti catūsu vipattīsu yāya kāyaci vipattiyā dassanena parāmaṭṭhuṁ anuddhaṁsetuṁ.
anya-e0103n7:275_0: 159.Sikkhāya sagāravoti sīladhanaṁ nissāya paṭiladdhasamādānattā sātisayaṁ sikkhāya
anya-e0103n7:275_1: sagāravo sappatisso hoti. Sabhāgavuttīti sampannasīlehi sabhāgavuttiko, tāya eva
anya-e0103n7:275_2: vā sikkhāya sabhāgavutti. Yo hi sikkhāgāravarahito, so tāya visabhāgavutti nāma hoti
anya-e0103n7:275_3: vilomanato. Yathā parehi saddhiṁ attano chiddaṁ na hoti, evaṁ dhammāmisehi paṭisantharaṇaṁ
anya-e0103n7:275_4: paṭisanthāro. Sikkhāya sagāravattā eva tattha appamatto hoti. Attānuvādabhayaṁ parānuvādabhayaṁ
anya-e0103n7:275_5: daṇḍabhayaṁ duggatibhayanti evamādīni bhayāni imassa dūrasamussāritānīti āha “attānuvādādibhayavirahito”ti.
anya-e0103n7:277_1: tappoṇena. Niccaṁ sadā pavattā dānasaṁvibhāgā yassa so niccapavattadānasaṁvibhāgo,
anya-e0103n7:277_2: tena. Idhāpi “pakatiyā”ti ānetvā sambandhitabbaṁ. Yaṁ parassa paṭiyattaṁ diyyati,
anya-e0103n7:277_3: taṁ dānaṁ. Yaṁ attanā paribhuñjitabbato saṁvibhajati, so saṁvibhāgo. Ito dāni pabhutīti
anya-e0103n7:277_4: ito paṭṭhāya dāni ajjatagge ajjadivasaṁ ādiṁ katvā. Adatvā na bhuñjissāmīti dānasamādānaṁ
anya-e0103n7:277_5: katvā. Taṁdivasanti tasmiṁ bhāvanārambhadivase. Tattha nimittaṁ gaṇhitvāti tasmiṁ
anya-e0103n7:277_6: dāne pariccāgacetanāya pavattiākārassa sallakkhaṇavasena nimittaṁ gahetvā. Vigatamalamaccheratādiguṇavasenāti
anya-e0103n7:277_7: vigatāni malamaccherāni etasmāti vigatamalamacchero, cāgo, tassa bhāvo vigatamalamaccheratā.
anya-e0103n7:277_8: Tadādīnaṁ guṇānaṁ, sampattīnaṁ, ānisaṁsānaṁ vā vasena.
anya-e0103n7:278_0: Sataṁdhammaṁ anukkamanti sādhūnaṁ bodhisattānaṁ dhammaṁ paveṇiṁ anu anu kamanto okkamanto,
anya-e0103n7:278_1: avokkamanto vā. Ye ime dāyakassa lābhā āyuvaṇṇasukhabalapaṭibhānādayo, piyabhāvādayo
anya-e0103n7:278_2: ca bhagavatā saṁvaṇṇitā pakittitā. Manussattaṁ vāti vā-saddo avuttavikappattho, tena
anya-e0103n7:279_0: Maccheramalenāti maccherasaṅkhātena malena. Atha vā maccherañca malañca maccheramalaṁ,
anya-e0103n7:279_1: tena maccherena ceva lobhādimalena cāti attho. Pajāyanavasenāti yathāsakaṁ kammanibbattanavasena.
anya-e0103n7:279_2: Kaṇhadhammānanti lobhādiekantakāḷakānaṁ pāpadhammānaṁ. Vigatattāti pahīnattā. Vigatamalamaccherena
anya-e0103n7:279_3: cetasāti itthambhūtalakkhaṇe karaṇavacanaṁ. Sotāpannassa satoti gehaṁ āvasantassa
anya-e0103n7:279_4: sotāpannassa samānassa. Nissayavihāranti nissāya viharitabbavihāraṁ, devasikaṁ vaḷañjanakakammaṭṭhānanti
anya-e0103n7:279_5: attho. Abhibhavitvāti agāraṁ āvasantānaṁ aññesaṁ uppajjanakarāgādiupakkilese abhibhuyya.
anya-e0103n7:280_0: Yo kiñci dentopi sāpekkhova deti, so muttacāgo na hoti, ayaṁ pana na evanti “muttacāgo”ti
anya-e0103n7:280_1: vuttaṁ. Vissaṭṭhacāgoti nirapekkhapariccāgoti attho. Yathā pāṇātipātabahulo puggalo
anya-e0103n7:280_2: “lohitapāṇī”ti vuccati, evaṁ dānabahulo puggalo “payatapāṇī”ti vuttoti dassento “dātuṁ
anya-e0103n7:280_3: sadā dhotahatthoyevā”ti āha. Tattha sadāti niccaṁ, abhiṇhanti attho. Pariccāgoti
anya-e0103n7:280_4: deyyadhammapariccāgoti adhikārato viññāyati. Yaṁ yaṁ deyyadhammaṁ pare yācanakā.
anya-e0103n7:280_5: Yācane yogo yācanayogo, parehi yācituṁ yuttoti attho. Yājena yuttoti dānena yutto
anya-e0103n7:280_6: sadā pariccajanato. Ubhayeti yathāvutte dāne, saṁvibhāge ca rato abhirato.
anya-e0103n7:281_0: 161. Yathā parisuddhasīlassa puggalassa akhaṇḍatādiguṇavasena attano sīlassa anussarantassa
anya-e0103n7:281_1: sīlānussatibhāvanā ijjhati, evaṁ parisuddhauḷārapariccāgassa puggalassa anupakkiliṭṭhameva
anya-e0103n7:281_2: attano pariccāgaṁ anussarantassa bhāvanā ijjhatīti dassetuṁ “vigatamalamaccheratādiguṇavasenā”tiādi
anya-e0103n7:282_0: Bhiyyosoti uparipi. Mattāya pamāṇassa mahatiyā mattāya, vipulena pamāṇenāti attho.
anya-e0103n7:282_1: Cāgādhimuttoti pariccāge adhimutto ninnapoṇapabbhāro. Tato eva alobhajjhāsayo katthacipi
anya-e0103n7:282_2: anabhisaṅgacitto. Paṭiggāhakesu mettāyanavasena pariccāgo hotīti mettāya mettābhāvanāya
anya-e0103n7:282_3: anulomakārī anurūpapaṭipatti. Visāradoti visado attanova guṇena katthacipi amaṅkubhūto
anya-e0103n7:284_1: uddhaṁ āgatehi. Yādisā hi ariyānaṁ santāne lokiyāpi saddhādayo, na tādisā kadācipi
anya-e0103n7:284_2: pothujjanikā saddhādayo. Dibbantīti devā. Cattāro mahārājāno etesanti catumahārājā,
anya-e0103n7:284_3: te eva cātumahārājikā. Tettiṁsa sahapuññakārino tatthūpapannāti taṁsahacaritaṁ ṭhānaṁ
anya-e0103n7:284_4: tāvatiṁsaṁ, tannivāsinopi devā taṁsahacaraṇato eva tāvatiṁsā. Dukkhato yātā apayātāti
anya-e0103n7:284_5: yāmā. Tusāya pītiyā itā upagatāti tusitā. Bhogānaṁ nimmāne rati etesanti nimmānaratino.
anya-e0103n7:284_6: Paranimmitesu bhogesu vasaṁ vattentīti paranimmitavasavattino. Brahmānaṁ kāyo samūho
anya-e0103n7:284_7: brahmakāyo, tappariyāpannatāya tattha bhavāti brahmakāyikā. Tatuttarīti tato brahmakāyikehi
anya-e0103n7:284_8: uttari, upari parittābhādike sandhāya vadati. Devatā sakkhiṭṭhāne ṭhapetvāti “yathārūpāya
anya-e0103n7:284_9: maggenāgatāya saddhāya samannāgatā, sīlena sutena cāgena paññāya samannāgatā ito
anya-e0103n7:284_10: cutā tattha upapannā tā devatā, mayhampi tathārūpā saddhā sīlaṁ sutaṁ cāgo paññā
anya-e0103n7:284_11: ca saṁvijjatī”ti devatā sakkhiṭṭhāne ṭhapetvā sakkhiṁ otārentena viya attano saddhādiguṇā anussaritabbā.
anya-e0103n7:285_0: Yadi evaṁ sutte ubhayaguṇānussaraṇaṁ vuttaṁ, taṁ kathanti anuyogaṁ manasi katvā āha
anya-e0103n7:285_1: “sutte panā”tiādi. Tattha kiñcāpi vuttanti “attano ca, tāsañca devatāna”nti ubhayaṁ
anya-e0103n7:285_2: samadhuraṁ viya sutte kiñcāpi vuttaṁ. Atha kho taṁ “devatānaṁ saddhañca sīlañcā”tiādivacanaṁ.
anya-e0103n7:285_3: Sakkhiṭṭhāne ṭhapetabbanti “vutta”nti parato padaṁ ānetvā sambandhitabbaṁ. Kimatthaṁ
anya-e0103n7:285_4: pana sakkhiṭṭhāne ṭhapananti āha “devatānaṁ attano saddhādīhi samānaguṇadīpanatthanti
anya-e0103n7:285_5: veditabba”nti. Kasmā pana sutte yathārutavasena atthaṁ aggahetvā evaṁ attho gayhatīti
anya-e0103n7:286_0: 163.Tasmāti yasmā aṭṭhakathāyaṁ devatā sakkhiṭṭhāne ṭhapetvā attano guṇānussaraṇaṁ
anya-e0103n7:286_1: daḷhaṁ katvā vuttaṁ, sīlacāgānussatīsu viya idhāpi attano guṇānussaraṇaṁ jhānuppattinimittaṁ
anya-e0103n7:286_2: yuttaṁ, tasmā. Pubbabhāge bhāvanārambhe. Aparabhāgeti yathā bhāventassa upacārajjhānaṁ
anya-e0103n7:286_3: ijjhati, tathā bhāvanākāle. Yadi attano eva idha guṇā anussaritabbā, kathamayaṁ devatānussatīti
anya-e0103n7:286_5: bhāvanā “devatānussatī”ti vuttā, na devatānaṁ, tāsaṁ guṇānaṁ vā anussaraṇenāti dasseti.
anya-e0103n7:286_6: Pubbabhāge vā pavattaṁ devatāguṇānussaraṇaṁ upādāya “devatānussatī”ti imissā samaññā
anya-e0103n7:286_7: veditabbā. Tathā hi vakkhati “pubbabhāge devatā ārabbha pavattacittavasenā”ti. Sesaṁ suviññeyyameva.
anya-e0103n7:288_1: vitthāravasena pavattadesanāyaṁ, mahānāmasuttaṁ sandhāya vadati. Bhagavātiādīnaṁ
anya-e0103n7:288_2: atthanti bhagavātiādīnaṁ padānaṁ atthaṁ. Atthavedanti vā hetuphalaṁ paṭicca uppannaṁ
anya-e0103n7:288_3: tuṭṭhimāha. Dhammavedanti hetuṁ paṭicca uppannaṁ tuṭṭhiṁ. “Ārakattā araha”nti anussarantassa
anya-e0103n7:288_4: hi yaṁ taṁ bhagavato kilesehi ārakattaṁ, so hetu. Ñāpako cettha hetu adhippeto, na
anya-e0103n7:288_5: kārako, sampāpako vā. Yonena ñāyamāno arahattattho, taṁ phalaṁ. Iminā nayena sesapadesupi
anya-e0103n7:288_7: “yasmā pana sā sammāpaṭipadā”tiādinā ca tattha tattha hetuapadeso katoyevāti. Dhammūpasaṁhitanti
anya-e0103n7:289_1: daṭṭhabbaṁ, avadhāraṇañca tesaṁ sukhasiddhidassanatthaṁ. Tenāha “tesaṁ hī”tiādi.
anya-e0103n7:289_2: Na puthujjanānaṁ sabbena sabbaṁ ijjhantīti. Tathā hi vakkhati “evaṁ santepī”tiādi.
anya-e0103n7:289_3: Yadi evaṁ, kasmā mahānāmasuttādīsu bahūsu suttesu ariyasāvakaggahaṇaṁ katanti? Tesaṁ
anya-e0103n7:290_0: Nikkhantanti niggataṁ nissaṭaṁ. Muttanti vissaṭṭhaṁ. Vuṭṭhitanti apetaṁ. Sabbametaṁ
anya-e0103n7:290_1: vikkhambhanameva sandhāya vadati. Gedhamhāti palibodhato. Idampīti buddhānussativasena
anya-e0103n7:290_2: laddhaṁ upacārajjhānamāha. Ārammaṇaṁ karitvāti paccayaṁ katvā, pādakaṁ katvāti attho.
anya-e0103n7:291_0: Sambādheti taṇhāsaṁkilesādinā sampīḷe saṁkaṭe gharāvāse. Okāsādhigamo lokuttaradhammassa
anya-e0103n7:291_1: adhigamāya adhigantabbaokāso. Anussatiyo eva anussatiṭṭhānāni. Visuddhidhammāti visujjhanasabhāvā,
anya-e0103n7:291_2: visujjhituṁ vā bhabbā. Paramatthavisuddhidhammatāyāti paramatthavisuddhiyā nibbānassa
anya-e0103n7:292_0: 166.Evaṁ santepīti evaṁ mahānāmasuttādīsu anekesu suttesu ariyasāvakasseva vasena
anya-e0103n7:292_1: chasu anussatīsu desitāsupi. Yassānubhāvenāti yassa cittappasādassa balena. Pītiṁ
